title: Messages
description:
Meet Messages, Google's official app for texting (SMS, MMS) and chat (RCS). Message anyone from anywhere with the reliability of texting and the richness of chat. Stay in touch with friends and family, send group texts, and share your favorite pictures, GIFs, emoji, stickers, videos and audio messages.
Clean, intuitive, and comfortable design
Instant notifications, smart replies and a fresh new design make communicating faster and more fun. With dark mode, you can use Messages comfortably in low-light situations.
Easy sharing
Select or take pictures and videos directly from the app and share easily. You can even send audio messages to your contacts.
Richer conversations
Send audio messages, emoji, stickers, or your location. You can also send and receive payments with Google Pay.
Powerful search
Now you can find more of the content shared in your conversations: tap on the search icon and select a specific contact to see your messaging history with them and all the photos, videos, addresses or links you shared with each other.
Chat features (RCS)
On supported carriers, you can send and receive messages over Wi-Fi or your data network, see when friends are typing or when they have read your message, share images and videos in high quality, and more.
Messages is supported on devices running Android‚Ñ¢ 5.0 Lollipop and above.

developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and stability improvements.
comments: I have it and I use it, and I love it. However the only reason it's not my default messages app, is only because my samsung default app has "Quick Response". When I'm driving my taxi, it's nice that I can automatically send a message letting them know im not ignoring them... lol if you guys can get that on your app, I'd be in heaven. Great job tho, guys. It's a great app.

I got this app in order to send/receive texts over wifi. Unfortunately, even after tinkering with it for several hours and reading a lot of troubleshooting articles, I was not able to get this feature to work. Needless to say, I'm disappointed and a bit irritated about the wasted time; I'm now going to uninstall this app and go look for one that actually works.

Well.. This app does sometimes get crappy, changing the interface drastically by showing messages when typing slightly edged towards the left rather its usual form, to the right. Gifs take forever to send when one sends it in a bunch, one after another. It says "sending.." on the bottom and most of the time, have to resend it. When searched for gifs, it loads a lot, not even showing up.. just the big, grey block of boxes appear. I would expect something far more smoother. Please fix it.

I just got a new phone and I'm trying to set up the advanced chat features but it keeps getting stuck in the verifying phone number part. It hangs on the 'status: setting up' part when it says verifying number and when I press retry it hangs there for a few minutes before the retry button turns blue again indicating that I can retry again. And I've tried all the things that were suggested in the help section in the articles.

There's a god damn pandemic and text messages are pretty essential. Not just this phone I have now, but every Android. I'm not getting all group texts from my family or some are missing. It's Garbage --- also, Don't patronize me by giving me a default troubleshooting article. There's an issue it's been going on forever and it needs to be fixed. you want people to use your phones instead of iPhones, well I want to be able to receive text messages from my family especially right now... F you

title: Verizon Messages
description:
Stay connected using Verizon Messages sync features for your Smartphone, tablet, and computer. Keep the conversation going even when you‚Äôre switching between devices. Connect with family, friends, teammates, and more through personalized group chats, texts, photos, videos and gift cards worth up to $100 at stores like Starbucks, Dominos, and more. Now anyone can download and chat with Verizon Messages, even non Verizon customers (available on compatible devices).

GROUP CHATS ‚Äì Create larger group chats with up to 250 people. Send and receive photos/videos in seconds. Personalize your chat experience with avatars, backgrounds and more. You can even mute a conversation or add or remove members or without creating a new group.
YELP INTEGRATION ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and easily access Yelp from within the app. Search for restaurants, entertainment and directions. Make plans and share the details all within your chat.
SHARE YOUR LOCATION ‚Äì Glympse‚Ñ¢ lets you share your location with the people you choose for the length of time you set. Perfect for meeting up, or letting people know you‚Äôre running late.
SEND AN eGIFT ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and select eGifts icon. Easily send an eGift card right through text message. eGifting has been expanded to include eGift cards from more than 30 brands
SYNC ACROSS DEVICES ‚Äì Download Verizon Messages on all your devices, and sync messages across your smartphone, tablet and computer. Switch devices whenever you want. Make calls with your tablet anywhere.
DRIVING MODE ‚Äì Turn on driving mode to send an Auto-Reply message and disable incoming message notifications so you don‚Äôt get distracted on the road.
HD VOICE CALLING ‚Äì Eligibility rules apply. Link your phone number to the Verizon Messages app on your tablet and make and receive calls wherever they want on any network (cellular or Wi-Fi).

Other features:
# Schedule messages to be delivered at a specific date/time, even if your phone is turned off.
# Search the web for images and gifs to include in your chat with Yahoo search.
# Express yourself through colorful Emoji‚Äôs by tapping on highlighted keywords when composing messages.
# Send and receive messages over Wi-Fi from your smartphone, iOS device, tablet, PC, MAC, and web browser.

Need Help? Visit our Support Pages at
http://support.verizonwireless.com/clc/features/data_services/verizon-messages.html
View the complete Terms & Conditions at:
https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/verizon-messages-legal/
View the Verizon Messages privacy policy at:
https://www.verizon.com/about/privacy/verizon-messages-app-privacy-policy

recentChanges: Bug Fix - Inability to use camera to send pictures within the app - Fixed.
comments: Seriously, what just happened?! App just updated and totally screwed my personalized settings up. Until the update my font was the same as my system font. And the font color was different. Now I can only change the font to a specific font choice and the color blends into the background of the list. I cant tell who's messege I am opening! Why do you guys gotta mess with what wasnt broken. App was great until this update.

The 3/18 update broke the app. It switched my number to my wife's number in the profile, and I am not receiving texts or able to send them. I cannot find a way to fix it within the app. This is ridiculous. Did you people not bother to test this before screwing up the app? It was fine as is, if it isn't broke don't "fix" it. Now it's useless. Stupid. I'm working remote thanks to Coronavirus, and now I'm without the texting my team uses to communicate. FIX THIS ASAP.

The update is more of a downgrade. The interface now is smaller making text threads look cluttered. Also can't have black font on most of the colored chat bubbles and white writing is really hard on a lot of peoples eyes, not just mine. Going to try reverting back to old version. It reset all of my customizations even avatar.

Before the updates I really liked this app. I recommended it to all of my friends and family. I don' like it as much anymore. The cursor is nonexistent unless you tap on the screen. You can't just start deleting unless you tap on the screen. I liked the old app, I didn't even mind the old app crapping out on picture mode - which used to be really cute before it sucked. But the changes you keep making don't improve this app. Change it back to having cute pictures without crashing. Have a cursor.

It's extremely ugly now and has a similarly ugly loading screen of sorts all of a sudden when it didn't before. And before they go "Oh you can change how it looks", it isn't the backgrounds and bubbles and text styles that are ugly it's the layout and the little bar area you type in that look like the back end of a donkey with the flu standing in the rain. Otherwise it's fine. Four out of five because it technically works well, I just think it looks awful.

comments: This new messages seems to be loaded with advertisements that are quite disturbing! Also, it is not easy to delete the messages. Apparently, you can no longer delete just one message, you have to delete the entire conversation with that person. I don't know what happened to the old messages, but this new version is not very user friendly!

This app comes compatible with the Samsung phone message data" I've have been using this app for 13yrs on my Samsung phone . I just love the data that it provide it gives you lots of options, on the app to make your messages or your texts simple to file, in places U want them go!!! This is my first time using this app on the Lg phone , I do not get the same options as I do on my Samsung phone" Because Lg uses it own message home. But I am able to use it as my default data on my Lg""

Why are ads popping up while I am texting? I HATE THAT! It is distracting and annoying üò°. I'm NOT interested in these products, and if I were, I know how to download them for my convenience, when I'm ready. Pop ups while texting??? Why? Please discontinue!
Too many ads! I'll be in the middle of a text and an ad pops up, interrupting me. Now ads are displaying above where I'm typing. Ridiculous, I'm uninstalling.
I recently went to Verizon and I did not like their message system. This is the one I had prior. And I do like it. It makes my messages much more manageable.

title: Messages
description:
Messages brings a refreshingly beautiful and responsive Material Design touch to the stale state of text messaging. In a world with clunky SMS and MMS apps cluttered with bloat and ads, Messages is something to get excited about. We‚Äôre making texting magical again.

Here‚Äôs why we think you‚Äôll love it
‚Ä¢ Material Design: And lots of it. Messages is the most beautiful text messenger available
‚Ä¢ Themes: And nearly 200 of them available. Each one, hand picked by Google in the Material Design guidelines
‚Ä¢ Night Mode: Like to have dark themes? So do we. Control it yourself, or turn on Automatic Night Mode and have night mode turned on automatically when it's dark out.
‚Ä¢ Customization: It's your app. Make it yours!
‚Ä¢ Messages Reply: Reply to messages without having to leave what you're doing
‚Ä¢ Group Messaging: So tell all your friends!
‚Ä¢ MMS: For when words just aren't enough
‚Ä¢ Delayed Messaging: Give yourself a second, make sure you said what you wanted to say!
‚Ä¢ Search: You care about your messages, so you should be able to find them. Now you can
‚Ä¢ Security: Messages is protected against the Stagefright MMS exploit on Android
‚Ä¢ Completely free: We also don't want to make you have to pay for extra features!
‚Ä¢ Anything else you want: We work on Messages every single day, and we're always looking for feedback. Let us know if you have any suggestions!

comments: Nobody wants to see a ad at the top of screen and really nobody wants to see one at all no matter where it's at. This was the only message app I would use and now I will never!

Terrible app after the update. Absolutely terrible. App doesn't open immediately, then freezes. No option to copy and forward a message. The 3 dots just open look and feel options. Also no longer able to delete messages. Please fire the children that updated the app.

Since the " upgrade", most of the useful features are gone. Can no longer forward a text, copy a section and paste it to another text or an email. It's terrible now. going to find a different app to use.

This app is not working well after update and some features removed. Previously, it was possible to set different message tones in different numbers but now it's impossible. Please update this feature.
The app constantly changes my contact photos and messages almost everytime I click on a message.

title: Messages + SMS
description:
Messages + SMS is brought to you by the Contacts Plus Team - awarded ‚Äòtop developer‚Äô by Google Play!

Messages + SMS is a messages / SMS launcher for Contacts+, the FREE ‚Äòall in one‚Äô contacts, messages (SMS), dialer & call log app. Key features include:

CONNECT WITH FRIENDS, BLOCK SPAMMERS
Block unwanted people via caller ID & block. Whether it‚Äôs a call or sms - you‚Äôre always in control over the people you connect with.

PROTECT YOUR CONTACTS
Advanced Backup & sync makes it easy to backup your contacts, messages (sms) and call logs so you‚Äôll never lose them again.

Above all, Your contacts are yours and are never shared with anyone. You can customize and select which features to use, change themes and adjust it to fit your needs. We even added dedicated launchers such as Messages + SMS to help you get directly to your preferred screens in the app.

comments: It used to be good but app appears glitchy now, in group messages it sometime will load all messages and sometimes it won't. When sending message in group chat, it'll show up in separate individual messages. Also when I downloaded it, it says it may not even be compatible with current Android version? I am using a Galaxy S20 running android 10

This used to be the best SMS/MMS app after Google killed Hangouts. You could set different wallpapers for each contact, different notifications, combine one contact with multiple phones into one conversion. Recent updates have killed all but one of the features that made it stand out from the pack, and they want $10/month for it now! The "lifetime license" I bought a couple years ago just flew right out the window. I used to recommend this app to everyone. No longer.

The previous version combines a contact person with multiple mobile number into one conversation and it tells the receiver what number the sender use.........The new version still combine the conversation but it does not tell what the sender number used to receiver

Downloaded it after I read about being able to customize it more than the factory messaging app that came standard on my S7. Opened it and right away it wants me to download ANOTHER app just to be able use it?! Needless to say, I uninstalled it right away.

I accidentally clicked on this app, and it actually looked good. So I downloaded it. It didn't take long to download. So when it finished downloading, I opened it, and then it said some nonsense saying "Please download our Contacts app." Like, can't you access my contacts? Unbelieveable.

title: Color Messages - SMS, MMS
description:
Color Messages is a new SMS & MMS app with powerful features, such as Scheduled Message, Archive Messages, Pin To Top, Send Delay and so on. Personalize your message with pretty SMS themes, hot emojis & stickers and unique text messages signature. This texting app also has Private Box and Privacy Mode, which protect your privacy all the time!

Add joy to your life! Get free and interesting Color Messages now!

üî•Hot Features:

Fancy SMS Themes - Different SMS style for you to choose from: Flower or Flash Neon, Butterfly or Bow-knot, Dark or Tiger.
Popular Emojis & Stickers - Different kinds of hot message emojis & magic stickers offer you more choice while chatting.
Private Box - Add private contacts into the box, set pattern lock that only unlocked by you!
Pin To Top - Top important contacts. Don't miss text messages again.
Send Delay - Give you time to correct the wrong text message.

üì£More Powerful Features:

‚óè SMS & MMS - Color Messages supports pictures, audio and video messages.
‚óè Scheduled Message - Send messages at a specified time, never miss birthday blessing for your friends.
‚óè Signature - Set up emojis or words as your unique text signature.
‚óè Lock Message - Lock up important messages, avoid deleting them by mistake.
‚óè Pretty Chat Bubbles - Change the bubble color and style as you like.
‚óè Personalize Font - Message font, font size and text color, customize as you want.
‚óè Theme Color - Customize colors for your text messages.
‚óè Personalize Text & Chat Background - Fun and trendy background for you to choose from, or set up your favorite photos.
‚óè Block Contacts - No disturb from blocked text messages.
‚óè Notifications - Plenty of notification ways for your choice. LED light, vibrate or mute.
‚óè Dual SIM - Dual SIM mode is supported.

comments: Love the look and feel of this app. Beautifully configured and easy to customize. But it keeps crashing - and sometimes crashing other apps I'm in when I don't even know this one is running (screen says color messages has stopped - but meanwhile it's crashed whatever else I'm running at the time). So frustrating, bc I really wish I could keep using this app!

Edit: I have experienced the group messaging issue . It gets me confused because they send separately. Please fix this issue. Old review: A great alternative SMS other than stock SMS messaging app. I've been using this app for about 2 weeks now. It has not once crashed or lagged. It is super user friendly and has a nice, clean, and overall look. I like the personal settings available to use and especially like the fact that there are ZERO ads. This is now my default messaging app. Great job!

love the app. had to upgrade from the note 5 to the note 10plus and the text app that's pre installed doesn't let me (or I just couldn't figure it out) assign different text rings to different people and I couldn't change my back ground. this app allowed me to set up my texting the way I've had it for years! the only down fall I found was all the ring tones that come with the app, to my ears are a little to similar to each other. I just went and downloaded some other tones and problem solved.

I love this app. I only wish the ones I'm sending a message to could also receive my new look when i send them a message. I guess if everyone sent different looks it would clash. It would be fun to see what each person used though. Also i have to choose to use this app each time i check or email someone. Wish it was set to continue until I changed it myself. I chose the black with gold butterflies. Very elegant.

Samsung Note 8. A little disappointed, I have been using this app for a couple of months now and I have noticed that my "sound indicator" doesn't always notify me of an incoming message. That can be annoying especially when you are expecting something. I enjoy the backgrounds available for each contact. I hope that the sound can be fixed or I will have to go back too Message +.

title: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
description:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere. 
 
FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like facetime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.  
 
UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS 
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they‚Äôre across the world.  Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop. 
 
RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.
 
TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE 
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface. 
 
EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS 
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.
 
SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS 
There‚Äôs no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.
 
SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money from friends in the app by adding your debit card or PayPal account.
 
SHARE YOUR LOCATION
Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.
 
CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.
 
BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger. 

COMPATABLE ACROSS PLATFORMS 
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and iOS.
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/ 
LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (http://messenger.com/)   

* Data rates apply

comments: I used to never have problems sharing videos from YouTube on messenger. But lately I can't seem to send any messages that include content from YouTube. Can someone please help with this problem? I've been having this problem for the past 4 days now. Today is the 22nd of March 2020. When I try to send a video from YouTube to my friends the messenger app closes. Or doesn't even show up as an option.

Functionality breaks constantly. Delays in message sending, receiving. People I talk to on a regular basis just disappearing from my recently talked to. Now the latest update has broken sharing from other apps. I have to download every image first and send it through messenger instead of being able to share directly from the other app, as before. Messenger is the only thing keeping me using Facebook and they sell to make it worse every month.

What's wrong whith this app?! Messages can't be sent on my screen, while others see my messages and it doesn't showing me that. My messages are sent but not delivered or seen. And my chat list isn't loading. It happens to me every day and resetting end reinstalling isn't working. Fix this Facebook. It's annoying. üôÑ It started 3-4 weeks ago.

Messenger recent update is bugged and I have tested it already on all 3 devices of mine, both android and iOS. Whenever I am trying to share something through messenger (be it a YouTube video, a photo, or an audio clip I have recorded in my phone's internal app), it will only pull up the Messenger app as if I am not sharing anything!!

messenger sucks anymore.....have not been able to share and send articles to my friends as I did before, by clicking on share, then messenger and then name used to come up and I would click send next to their name, but will not and has not done for three going on four days today and do not know why! Is there something wrong with messenger? Can you please fix this problem and asap, thanks!

title: Messaging Classic
description:
Message Classic (alternate name as Messaging Classic) is the stock messaging (SMS & MMS) app ported from the Android native system! 

Most of the phone manufacturers, for example, Samsung, LG, Sony and HTC, build their own messaging apps with different user experience, Message Classic brings you the native taste with Google design. 

In Nexus 5, Google Hangouts is the default messaging app, while the original messaging app is gone. Message Classic gives you a chance to bring it back. 

Remember to disable your other third party SMS apps' notifications or you may get duplicated notifications for each message.

Highlights:
‚Ä¢  Totally free. 
‚Ä¢  Fully support Android 4.4. 
‚Ä¢  Fully support MMS for all Android versions.
‚Ä¢  Quick reply pop-ups
‚Ä¢  Quick action button support in message notification

In Android 4.4, an SMS app can not update SMS/MMS data if it's not the default SMS app. So please set Message Classic as your default SMS app.

title: Smart Messages for SMS, MMS and RCS
description:
Smart Messages is the Best SMS, MMS & RCS (Chat) replacement app for your phone, with the greatest advanced and rich chat features for a gorgeous and fast texting experience with your friends. And the best part? It‚Äôs all completely free!

Rich Communication Features
Smart Messages packs a modern Delivery and Read Receipt feature for SMS/MMS that works just like in popular instant messaging apps but without creating an account. It also has a fast and accurate Typing Indicator that shows you when your friends are texting you.

Note: The delivery receipts work out of the box, however the read receipts and typing indicator require Internet access and that your contacts use Smart Messages too. Rich Communication Features are compatible with every phone number and all mobile carriers.

Smart Messages is the BEST alternative to your stock SMS, MMS and RCS (chat) app, and the 1st messaging app with a predictive AI engine that anticipates what you want so you don‚Äôt have to search.

See, not all texting apps are the same. If you are looking for the best SMS app 2020 look no further. With Smart Messages you get a messenger with first-class user experience that saves you time and makes your life easier.

Smart Messages has a great user interface based on the latest Material Design principles and offers the most complete set of features that you will love: read receipts and typing indicator (only available to Smart Messages users), group chat, fast replies, emoji predictions based on intelligent emotion recognition in your text messages, easy sharing of videos, images, your geolocation‚Ä¶ Texting with friends and family will never be the same!

Smart Messages is 100% FREE FOREVER (NO subscription, NO paid features), does not track you, and protects your privacy as well as your phone data!

Download now the best SMS app for Android and start a magical journey!

Group Chat
Send and receive messages from multiple recipients, all in the same place. Please be aware that your carrier may limit this feature.

Dual SIM
Switch easily between two phone numbers.

Smart Notifications
Answer directly from notifications with a full-featured experience.

Fast Reply
Respond to messages even faster with smart suggestions.

Magic Cards
Smart Messages uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) to show you relevant actions when you need them, like a "Copy code" option when you receive a code or one-time password (OTP). It can also show you smart actions for calls, emails, maps and calendar events. You can display the Magic Cards with a short tap on any message marked with ‚ú®

Pro Tip: You can also share Magic Cards! Just long press the card and choose if you want to send it to your current contact (drop on the right button) or to someone else (left button).

Pin to Top
Long-press to pin your favorite chats on top of the list.

Mass Sending
Bulk send any message with the multiple SMS option.

Schedule sending
Define a date and time and automatically postpone sending a message.

Dark Mode
Manually or automatically switch to dark mode at predefined hours.

Emoji Predictions
Get emoji suggestions related with the emotion in your message.
Download this option from ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù ‚Äì it‚Äôs free!

Easy Sharing
Select and share instantly any SMS, pictures, GIF, stickers, videos, audio messages, your location, etc.

Wallpapers and Themes
Personalize screens and chat bubbles with custom colors, and set cool wallpapers or any of your own pictures as background in your chats.

Completely Free
Smart Messages is forever free of charge and without subscription.

Your privacy is our top priority!
We don‚Äôt store any of your data on our servers. Check out our Privacy Policy for more details about our commitment to protect your privacy.

summary: Upgrade your SMS with Next Generation Texting
comments: I LOVE the app. It the closet thing to iMessage app not just theme wise, but experience wise. I think it should be androids default messaging app... butttttt it's way too buggy, the ads are annoying (I know yall are working on a premium version), and it's very disappointing it uses old Android emojis (which are damn near as bad as windows emojis) instead of using Android 10 emojis. That should be stock and ios emojis would be a GREAT option....p.s. I NEVER leave reviews but I see potential.

very easy to use, very responsive. I like auto dark mode at night. I was hoping that this app would join all messages from the same contact into one thread, but unfortunately not. I guess I have to find my old Nokia for such advanced features :)

I installed this App a few minutes ago. Turned off rich messaging features. I sent a few sms. Still this App consumed 38 MB of data and dropped my phone's battery by 3%. This App looks suspicious, collecting huge amount of data in the background. I think, this App does exactly opposite of what it says here.
Not what was expecting, very good app. The only thing I dislike is the add in message, you can't get rid of it, and there is nothing to buy which will remove the add.

I am really liking this app. Easily the best messaging app I've tried. As others have mentioned, once there is a paid option to be ad free, I can't give it 5 stars. Once that is available, I will change to 5 stars! Keep up the good work.

title: Messages
description:
SMS Message is a smart messaging app that helps you say more and do more! Say ‚Äúhello‚Äù with an instant message!

Messages Lite Express yourself better with stickers, Smart Reply, and HUGE emojis & text. Messanges brings instant messenger for texting (SMS, MMS) and chat!

Android Messages is a message application that allows you to exchange messages with any users with phone numbers, without needing to sign up for a separate messaging feature. Enjoy texting your family and friends conveniently using Messages For SAMSUNG. Jio messages is the live offline messaging app for sending instant messages, pictures, documents, video and audio.

Use Message Plus to send SMS messages to mobiles worldwide and with SMS Connect you can now also read and reply to your phone's SMS messages. Keep in touch with all of your contacts using the Messages app on your phone. There's so much you can do with your Massage, LIKE mute conversations or assign special Message Ringtone for certain contacts.

Messages App Settings to Know
Here are some useful tools and settings for the Message Box that you might not have known about Samsung Messages. Use them to get the most out of your Texts and Messages.

Search
Use the Search icon to find a message thread you are looking for!

Delete
Tap and hold a SMS you want to delete, and then tap Delete located on the bottom right. Tap Delete again to confirm.

Star Messages
Tap and hold a chat bubble that you want to star or favorite, and then tap Star message. To view the starred messages, go the Conversations tab, tap More options (the three vertical dots), and then tap Starred messages.

Block messages
You can block and delete unwanted messages. When you get a sketchy text, select Block number when the popup is displayed, and then tap Delete. To view blocked numbers and messages, or to block a number, go to the Conversations tab, tap More options (the three vertical dots), and then tap Settings. Tap Block numbers and messages.

Change the font size
You want to catch every word in your messages, but the font's a little small. Adjust the font size for individual text message without affecting the general font size setting for your phone.

Create and schedule a message
Messages has everything you need to craft that perfect greeting, including options to schedule a message in advance.

Send Text Messages, MMS in Messages
- Open Messages on your phone
- Tap Compose in the lower right-hand corner
- Select the desired recipient(s)
- Tap Enter message
- Write your text, and then tap Send!

Schedule Message
- Write the text and then tap Add (the plus sign or arrow)
- Set the date and time you want your text message delivered
- It can be up to a year from the current date

Message anyone from anywhere with the reliability of texting and the richness of chat. open a message that you‚Äôd like to view from the Messages app, and then use two fingers to pinch in and out on the screen. The font will automatically become larger or smaller.

SMS Organizer say more with status messages, photos, videos, maps, emoji, stickers, and animated GIFs. Book Massage contacts anytime, even if they‚Äôre offline. Messenger is a communication hang out that allows you to chat with the whole world for free Gchat, Gtalk. By using Messaging Apps, you can make sms chat with friends more interesting and sms text is a fun way to break the ice when meeting new people.

use Messaging to get the best offers from your SMS inbox in one place. Messenger for Messages is a FREE Messenger, Text Messaging, Messages Backup and SMS app. With text message app you can connect with people everywhere, send text msg without internet connection. Don't need 4G or Wifi. Easy to use Messages App Download.

summary: Send & Receive Text Messages, MMS in Messages. Messenger for everyone! üí¨
comments: Such an excellent text message organiser. I was using Google Messages, until my friend showed me this app. I absolutely love the features related to finance. The app shows a list of recent transactions, which looked pretty cool. I don't usually use/like Microsoft apps, but this one proved to br an exception.

Amazing app. Recommend all to use . It has simply removed me the headache of managing advertisement and marketing smses by neatly organizing them in a separate category and I no longer receive any alert when these marketing messages arrive. I just delete them later at my convenience. Else, I would have been alerted every hour whenever a new ad or marketing message arrived. Now, none. This is neat and hassle free. Another amazing feature is the otp management . It neatly shows the otp on notificat

its best sms organizer. i love it. it segregates all kinds of messages: personal, promotion, transactions. it also reminds about upcoming payments, gives a brief synopsis of banc account, credit card accounts based on sms. and in its latest update they have added features which makes even promotional messages more useful. it helps you in segregating recent promotions /sales/ etc based on product categories like electronics/clothing/ etc. Simply speaking, i love this app.

Some really amazing features. It is in some ways similar to the now defunct Gmail 'Inbox". Cool features are categorisation of SMSs into different tabs for Personal, Updates, Promotions & Starred. Then grouping messages into Reminders tab, where you can see your active amazon etc orders, bills to be paid & you can click on the Pay option right from there. Another cool feature is, when you get an OTP, the drop down notification is really large, making it easy to read, even for someone who uses gla

I'm not a very good typer and Android Messages makes it so much easier by the predictive text. I love all the extras too ie the emojis Google search bar etc. The typeface makes reading a text so much easier of course you have the choice of setting your own. Well Done!!!

The brand new messaging app is simple, intuitive, personalizing and fun!

GO SMS Pro comes with beautiful themes, lovely stickers, private box, pop up windows, GO chat (send free SMS & MMS), dual sim support, and much more. We are committed to making GO SMS Pro faster, safer and tons of great features - messaging has never been so fun and efficient!

comments: Not good.. After the latest update.. You can't reply to messages right away unless you exit the app and go back in.. And it will take a few seconds or more to load it so you can reply to a message.. If you needed to hurry to reply to a message in emergency.. I say your out of luck.. Don't waste time with this app! You'll regret it if you do! I'm not kidding! Months later and still not working! And all these fake 5 star reviews on here by the developers are ridiculous! Update did NOT fix issue!

This used to be a really great app. The last few updates have sucked. I hate the fact that for the past few updates, I have to click on a notification then exit out of the program then restart the program to reply to whoever sent me a message. As of the last update I have lost all notification sound. No matter what I've tried I cannot seem to get the sound back. So now I have to constantly check my phone to see if anyone has messaged me. I hope they fix this app soon as I paid for it

*EDIT* my virus protection is now recognizing GoSMS as malware. I used to love this app but has completely fallen apart. I can no longer send photos and the message popup is so buggy it causes me to force close the app. I've even somewhat looked past the fullscreen pop up ads (that i find to be pretty unsafe in an emergency situation).

I've been using this app for a couple of years, after last update can't send text messages at all, which turned out to be quite a drama as I didn't know they were not being sent and delivered! I'm waiting for an update, but at present cannot use this app and my annual payment has not long been made. Very disappointing considering the number of complaints on this issue in the review comments.

Not happy withrecent updates, now my messages don't make a sound,, and about half of the time when I start responding to a message the send button is still grey so u can't hit send so I have to copy my message, go out of app and come back in to send message. I used to love this app it was second to none but lately it's just a headache I've read the same complaint by other people and hope the developer actually pays attention to these comments and might be able to fix theses issues

title: Block Text, SMS, Spam Blocker - Key Messages
description:
Key Messages is the new age, feature-rich option for Android's default text messages app.

Switch to Key Messages. Get more benefits. 

AUTOMATIC SPAM FILTER
Award winning and strongest spam blocker on Android. It automatically blocks spam messages from numbers, non-numbers and unknown senders. Our machine learning, AI based technology makes spam blocking better with each day.

TEXT BLOCKER
Easily block texts from your Ex GF/BF. Key Messages has the most powerful options to block text based on Mobile number, Sender title, Content keyword and Wildcard rules. See only desired and useful messages i.e. Key Messages in your clean inbox.

BACKUP & RESTORE WITHOUT DUPLICATION
Securely backup your valuable messages online, on your own Google Drive. Automate backup schedule to daily, weekly, monthly. Our unique de-duplication technology avoids message duplication when you restore backup in a new or an existing phone. The Block list and Allow list are also backed up. Enjoy robust & hassle-free SMS backup & restore. 

ORGANIZED SMS
Messages are grouped intelligently based on the varying sender title. Easily see personal & organization SMS in separate tabs. You can also mark important messages as Starred and find them in a separate folder. As the name suggests, Key Messages is designed to prioritize important messages.

CHARACTER & SMS CHARGE COUNTER
See real-time message character count and for how many SMS you will be charged for. Very unique and useful feature of Key Messages. Don‚Äôt lose money unknowingly.

DARK THEME
Gorgeous and very thoughtful dark theme. It is a pure delight to eyes. 

MMS COMPATIBLE
Unlike most other messaging apps, Key Messages is fully MMS compatible. Send and receive MMS easily.

DUAL SIM
Key Messages works seamlessly with dual SIM. Clearly see on which SIM you received the SMS. Easy design to select SIM while sending message.

POWERFUL SEARCH
Easily find the content that you are looking for. 

CLEAN & SIMPLE INTERFACE
The most clean & simple interface for an SMS app. It is designed keeping in mind your new age messaging needs and helping you achieve that in the most efficient way.

HIGH PERFORMANCE
May it be few or tens of thousand messages in your Inbox, Key Messages app is meticulously engineered for a smooth, robust and reliable performance. 

Many more features are under development. Try Key Messages. You will love it.


---------------------------------------------
All trademarks are owned by respective owners. Key Messages was earlier known as Clean Inbox.

title: Messenger Lite: Free Calls & Messages
description:
A fast and data-efficient messaging app to reach the people in your life. 

Messenger Lite:
- Installs quickly. It's less than 10MB to download!
- Saves data. It loads fast, runs efficiently and uses less mobile data.
- Works everywhere. Reach people when you're in an area with a slow or unstable internet connection.

With Messenger Lite, you can:
- Contact anyone on Messenger, Facebook or Facebook Lite.
- See when people are active and available to chat.
- Message people one-on-one or in groups to catch up or make plans.
- Send photos, links, or express yourself with stickers.
- Make one-on-one voice and video calls for free over Wi-Fi (otherwise standard data charges apply). Talk as long as you want, even with people in other countries!

title: Textra SMS
description:
Want a beautiful, super fast and highly customizable alternative to your stock Android messaging app?

Well today is your day. Textra is simply outstanding!

Comes with a bunch of great features, notably 180+ material design theme, bubble & app icon colors. Dark, light & auto-night modes, multiple bubble styles, scheduled (future) SMS & MMS, stop during send, slide to delete, slide to call, quick snap camera, multi-select picture gallery, quick reply SMS popup, awesome MMS GROUP messaging, quick voice memos, GIFs, 21 text sizes, message blocker / blacklisting, pin-to-top, automatic video & picture compression, plus heaps more!

Customize your preferred theme & bubble colors, signatures and notifications (icon shape, LED color, sound, vibration, privacy, reminders and muting) PER CONTACT as well.

Get all the latest (2900+) Android, Twitter, Emoji One & iOS style emojis including diversity (skin tone). Just pick your preferred emoji style and express yourself!

NEW: Copy Partial Text inside a bubble, tap a bubble to check out this great new feature!

It's pretty special; try it, tell your friends, shout from the treetops, but most of all enjoy it.

Fully compatible with Pushbullet, MightyText, Android Wear and Android Auto (car) for enhanced notifications and quick reply.

All Textra features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to make a once only in-app purchase to remove ads forever.

Support, Knowledge Base & Feedback @ https://textra.uservoice.com

Simple. Beautiful. Fast.

comments: I love this app and have been using the free version for several years. The customer support is the most amazing part of the app. They really care about how their app is running, respond lightening fast to questions and give easy to understand instructions on how to fix issues, which in my case have been problems with my phone not updating correctly. Keep up the good work Textra!

I was really enjoying this app but l started receiving messages all through the night last night, which is highly unusual for me. Upon contacting the senders to see why they were texting me all night, I found out that those messages were sent during the day and evening, but I never received them until after 2am! Why are my messages being delayed?? People probably thought I was ignoring their messages.

Textra is, and probably always will be my favorite alternative SMS app; it's clean, customizavle and almost identicly to stock Messaging apps. The only reason I'm doing four stars across almost every app I use, is the fact that the only new feature with paying for premium is ad removal. I get you have to make your money, but it would be nice to pay even an extra dollar for some more features! Otherwise, this is an amazing app!

This app is top notch. I have a Google pixel 3 and you really can't customize the messaging app the comes stock with the phone. So I figured I'd try this app and this app has many customization features. You can change the way the icon is colored, specific icons for specific contacts, custom word bubble shapes, different fonts, a huge GIF library and many more awesome features. If you want an extremely customizable SMS app, this is the one. I'd give it 6 stars if I could.

I love this app so much. The messages send right away, practically EVERYTHING you can customize, and it's just great all together. Hell, you can even change the color of the freaking app icon! This app is exactly what I was looking for. I have one issue though, whenever I send a video or gif or song or whatever, it takes a few minutes to send it, I don't know if my phone is just a little crappy or if it's a issue with the app itself, but still, Textra is great with that issue or not! :D

title: Pulse SMS (Phone/Tablet/Web)
description:
Want an SMS app that is fast, secure, and packed with all the features and customization you could want? Look no further. 

Pulse SMS is a seriously beautiful, next-generation, text messaging app. Did we mention that Pulse is also the highest rated messaging app on the Play Store? 

Pulse SMS is completely free to use on your phone, we don't collect or sell your data, and you will never see any ads. How's that for a top-notch user experience? We care deeply about your experience with the app, and believe that ads and shady data collection ruin that experience.

To round out its best-in-class phone app, Pulse re-imagines your communication by giving you the ability to sync your SMS and MMS messages available across all of your devices. Send and receive texts and pictures - seamlessly - from your computer, tablet, watch, car, or any device with an internet connection. All through your personal phone number.

No other app on Google Play can match our design, functionality, features, speed, or deep platform integration. This is text messaging, done right.


---------


A Taste of the Features
Pulse is jam packed with features. On top of syncing between all of your devices, here is a small taste of what makes it the ultimate messaging experience:
- Unparalleled design and fluid animations
- Endless global and per-conversation customization options, along with thousands of color choices
- Suggested Smart Replies within conversations
- Password protected, private conversations
- Share GIFs with your messages, from Giphy
- Powerful searching through messages and conversations
- Automatic message backup and restore with a Pulse account
- Preview web links
- Blacklist pesky spammers
- Delayed sending to give you time to edit or cancel messages you send
- Automated replies based on contacts, keywords, and driving/vacation modes
- Dual-SIM support
- plus so much more!


Supported Platforms
Pulse SMS has a web app that you can use. It also has native apps for tablets, MacOS, Windows, Wear OS, Samsung Galaxy Gear watches, Google Chrome, Firefox, Linux, and even Android TV. Check out all of our platforms, along with screenshots, here: https://messenger.klinkerapps.com/overview/


Price
Pulse is completely free to use on your phone - with no ads - and always will be! To text from other devices, you can choose between a small subscription fee (with a seven day free trial) or a one-time payment:
$0.99 / month
$5.99 / year
or $10.99 for a one-time purchase

This small payment helps me keep the lights on and develop new features, while not having to resort to ads or any type of data collection Don't want to pay? No problem, you can use the app on your phone, completely free.

You can also upgrade your subscription at any time, of course.


Encryption
If you are using the online service, I do have to store your messages in the cloud, to make them available to your other devices. All of your conversations are stored end-to-end encryption. You never have to worry about your data leaking out and no one can see your messages except for you. With Pulse, you get privacy and peace of mind, right out of the box: https://messenger.klinkerapps.com/encryption.html

Open Source
Are you a developer? Pulse is fully open source! Check it out: https://github.com/klinker-apps/pulse-sms-android


-------


Pulse is the premier web, computer, and phone messaging application on Android. Everything is instant, setup is a breeze, and it's design is unlike anything you have used.


Helpful Links

Website: https://messenger.klinkerapps.com/overview
Help Page: https://messenger.klinkerapps.com/help
Privacy Policy: https://messenger.klinkerapps.com/privacy.html

summary: The perfect SMS and MMS app - available across all your devices!
developerAddress:
1218 NE 49th St
Ankeny, IA 50021
recentChanges:
Pulse is helping you fight spam!

‚Ä¢ The app now has an option (in the Advanced Features menu), for how you want to handle messages that come from a phone number that is not in your contact list. You can choose to mute the conversation or just block it completely!
‚Ä¢ If you receive a group message full of spam, you can now blacklist all of the participants in that conversation with one click!
comments: Since installing Pulse 2 weeks ago I have sent more SMSs than I did in the 12 months before. The native apps (I'm using the Linux and OSX apps) make it so easy to manage messages. I've cleaned out all my old SMSs for the first time in years and it only took me 20 minutes. The apps have numerous issues - I had to manually refresh my account when I first set it up, I can't see a way to create folders using the native app, I had an SMS fail to send from my phone but the desktop app shows it as sent. BUT the ability to manage my SMSes from my desktop and smash out a 160-character text in 15 seconds is just too good. I would give this app 7 stars if I could, regardless of all the little issues.

This app is very inconsistent, It will send and receive messages and a few minutes later it won't send and it won't receive messages. I unenstalled it and reinstalled it and it worked great for an hour and then -- AGAIN -- it stopped sending and receiving messages. Sadly this program has several virtues but if it isn't trustworthy, it's useless üòüüòü

Love everything about Pulse, except the issue you sometimes face of sending / receiving video and the quality of the video. I've read numerous chats as to why that is and possible fixes, but still the issue exists. I'm a Verizon customer with the new Google Pixel 4, so if anyone has any insight or resolution on this please enlighten me. Still a (5) star app in my opinion, but really wish there was a way to remedy the video thing

Excellent app! The ability to filter on phrases is a key feature that makes this app worth the purchase! However, there is a bug in the app. If you delete or archive multiple conversations at once, only the first one you do takes effect. If you exit the app and go back in, then all of the other archive/delete operations are forgotten and those messages return to the inbox.

I've used this app for a very long time and have always loved it. However, for a few months now, some of my messages come in VERY delayed or not at all. Many times, pictures that are sent to me won't download or show up. I uninstalled Pulse for a week and used a different app and didn't experience any of those issues. But I love Pulse so much, that I re-installed it after a week, only to immediately experience the exact same things. It's still one of the better SMS apps available though

title: SMS from Android 4.4 with Caller ID
description:
The ultimate SMS and text message app that is conversational and simple, with a clean texting interface for SMS messages - the way apps used to be. 

Powerful and advanced features let the app identify the numbers of message senders and callers, even if they are not in your phone book, so you always know who is calling or writing to you.

SMS from Android 4.4 is built to give you a smoother, better, faster, and cleaner Android communication experience. Send text messages, pictures, recordings and much more. The app delivers text messages directly via the mobile network, so no Internet or Wi-Fi connection is needed*.

With this smart message app, you will never have to do more than click a button to identify an unknown number from an SMS or phone call. The Caller ID screen after each call displays information on who is calling, even if they are not in your phonebook. This way, you can avoid spam calls and easily save new contacts to your phonebook with just one click. 

SMS app features:

‚úÖ	Totally free to download
‚úÖ	Unlimited: Works across virtually all Android devices
‚úÖ	Offline messages: No Internet or Wi-Fi connection needed to send SMS messages*
‚úÖ	Multi-format messaging: Send SMS, pictures and videos instantly
‚úÖ	Voice messages: Record your voice and send it as an attachment
‚úÖ	SMS messages: One click to text a contact after each call. No need to input number again
‚úÖ	Number Search: Search for unknown numbers from texts, directly from the inbox
‚úÖ	Caller ID: Identify numbers in real-time ‚Äì even those not in your contact list

*Your service provider may charge you for sending offline SMS messages depending on your contract with them. Please check with you service provider regarding any charges you may receive.

title: Mei: SMS Texting + AI
description:
Mei is an upgrade to texting app that came with your phone. It combines all the best features in messaging apps with optional AI and more into a single app. It‚Äôs completely free, with no ads, no catch. When texting other Mei users, messages are sent as RCS (the upgrade to SMS), and end-to-end encrypted, so you can chat for free internationally and know it's secure!  See why Mei is one of the highest-rated SMS/MMS/RCS texting apps in the Play Store!

On top of it all, our app comes with an optional advanced AI named Mei (pronounced ‚ÄòMay‚Äô) that can give you real-time information as you text. Imagine Mei as your assistant, expert adviser and best friend, who's always available to tell you something about your conversations.

Does your best friend sound a little different today?  Does this person you just met seem romantically interested?  How do I best chat with my boss so we work better together?

There are hints, feelings, personalities and meaning buried in our text histories that are already on our phones (you don't even have to text through our app first).  Our AI assistant can interpret all your text conversations (even ones imported from other apps) and tell you things she notices about your chats that will make you better informed, ultimately leading to better relationships.  

How? She's seen millions of conversations just like yours where other users taught Mei how to recognize patterns that are indicative of almost everything in a relationship.  Our AI algorithms were first trained in English, but as more users around the world have interacted with Mei, the models have/will become more accurate in those languages.  So please correct Mei when she‚Äôs wrong and check back later as she‚Äôll improve over time!

Mei is compatible with MightyText, Pushbullet and mySMS for desktop and web access (our own desktop version coming soon). Mei syncs with any Android smartwatch, watch or wearable.

 Key Messaging Features: 
-	Fully customizable (inc. dark mode and monochrome theme)
-	Schedule messages or cancel them before they send
-	Conversations automatically organized into folders (inc. spam) 
-	Create custom folders and labels
-	Import conversations from other messaging apps
-	Audio / Voice messages
-	Mesh messaging coming soon

 When Messaging Other Mei Users‚Ä¶ 
-	Rich Communication Service (RCS) chat
-	End-to-end encryption
-	Message internationally for free
-	Unsend / delete text messages, even once read
-	Disappearing messages, deleted after they‚Äôre read
-	Expiring messages, deleted after a set time

 Key AI (+ Advanced) Features: 
-	AI assistant can be turned on or off freely
-	Interpret texts real-time to give you personalized advice
-	Detect when you or the person you‚Äôre texting is acting out of character
-	Reminders
-	Personality profiles on you and your contacts
-	Personality comparisons for you and your contacts
-	Reveal a secret admirer that may be hiding in your text conversations!
-	Earn credits for interacting with Mei and participating in anonymous polling
-	Many more features to come‚Ä¶

recentChanges:

comments: I came back hoping that there were some changes and I am disappointed. Other than changing colors and adding a background nothing has changed. The scene doesn't light up when you receive a message, so if you phone is on silent you may not know for a long while that you have a message. A big let down for me.

It works well most of the time! I like being able to stylize my texts. The only thing I currently have an issue with is when I try to send texts and it says I need to chose a recipient or whatever it says then I have to exit my texts, go back into them, then it sends.

I loved this app, until it stopped functioning. My primary issues are similar to everyone else's, I'm frequently not notified about a message or it doesn't come through till I open the app, I get the message that I need to input the person's number while in our chat despite having the number saved. However now my AI is completely dead. I can request alerts all I want but the symbol just spins, never giving me any messages at all. Im fully updated so, its basically just turned into a texting app.

Original: I don't use the AI features, but everything else works perfect. I've been through a couple texting/messaging apps, and I was tired of them never working properly...even on basic functions. MEi sends message quickly, and I really like the delayed message sending feature. It's especially handy when you think of something late at night, and you don't want to wake anyone up. You just want to get the message drafted while it's on your mind. Update: The app has started to crash and freeze..

Overall this app is fine but.. 1. Needs storage permission compulsorily to use basic SMS functionality. Why? Nobody does that! 2. As SIM selection is combined with message scheduling functionality, it's not very intuitive. Beyond that, selected SIM is not displayed prominently (in the text box) while sending and (on message thread) after sending the SMS.

title: PlayStation Messages - Check your online friends
description:
Use PlayStation Messages to see who's online and to send messages to your friends from your mobile device. Always stay connected with your friends even while you're away from your PS4.

The PlayStation Messages app for your mobile device includes the following features:

‚Ä¢ See who's online and what game they're playing.

‚Ä¢ Send text and voice messages as well as photos and stickers to your friends and groups.

‚Ä¢ Quickly access your groups by adding them to your favorites.

An account is required to use this app.

Use of this app is governed by the license agreement at the following URL: (http://www.scei.co.jp/legal/index.html).

recentChanges: - Stability and performance during use of some features has been improved.
comments: It's a great app that lets you talk to friends on PSN and is much easier than going and turning on your PlayStation just to chat. Though I would ask that you guys please add a couple features like PSN chat rooms and video/voice chat other than just messages. Also with messages where it shows the time sent and received, it's very buggy, I'll send a message and it'll say a random completely different time. For example I'll send a message at 10:00 pm and it'll say 9:43 am or something like that.

The app itself is overall useful. But there are glaringly upsetting points about the messenger app for playstation. Why does it need 3.3GB of space when Discord and other messengers are only 150MB? That is way more than necessary. There is nothing in this app that is different to make it better over others, you can't even have a party chat through it with your message group. Yet Facebook Messenger and Discord (with the exception of needing approvals) can have voice proper voice chats.

It's a great app. Use it all the time when I don't feel like turning my PS4 on. I would suggest it if you have a newer phone. I have a LG Stylo 5, and it works perfectly. I had a LG Stylo 4+,( Just like a year difference between manufacturing ) and I would open the app, and it would cause my phone to shut down, turn on, freeze, and restart. So, if you plan on getting this app, get a newer phone. But in all, a very great app.

2 stars because the app does work but for a while now my messages would disappear and not how on here or console anymore. when I would delete the app my messages still don't appear. Edit: after getting in contact with the playstation support staff everything does seem to be working properly now.

The only thing you can do in this app is send messages. I really don't understand why the chat feature wasn't implemented in the PlayStation app. This way you need to install both the messages app and the PlayStation app because you can't do basic stuff like sending or accepting friend requests or viewing other peoples profiles in this app since the app forces you to install the PlayStation app to do those things.

title: Messaging+ SMS, MMS Free
description:
It is an classic style Message app. Cool UI. It is very simple to use; it is an free version for most part of user,  if you want to change and custom more setting options, you should by the pro version.

FEATURE:

 - Cool Classic style UI. 
 - Support latest kitkat android 4.4
 - Support all emojis, send and receive emoji with friend, only 1st page in free version.
 - Support custom your own font.
 - Beautiful popup message dialog, support more pages popup dialog.
 - Internal snapshot support.
 - Manage all sms message conveniently.
 - Group message support.
 - Blink LED support. 
 - Support custom notification icon in Pro version.
 - Support custom bubble color in Pro version.
 - Custom ringtones in Pro version.

Important Note:

Notification problem:

  - if you can't see notification when you receive new message, you can check: Do you have installed the other third sms app? you should uninstall the third sms app first.

Emoji problem:

 - Press the menu and select "Insert Smile" Or press the attach button.
 - Emoji message will block by network carrier when across network carriers, pls try ask your friend to send emoji message to you by mms type message, if your friend can't see your emoji. pls try to send mms emoji message.

Out order of message problem:

 - If you don't need to see duplicate notifications, please try to enable "Setting - Receive settings - Block Sms Notification", Maybe it will cause two duplicate message on some devices.

 - If your message is out of order, please try to select "Block Sms Notification" option in settings.

APUS Message Center is one of the best free unified messenger app for android. It helps unify and manage all messages from SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail and 3rd party apps. It includes message management, notification mamagement, contact manager, dialer and call log. It will completely bring you a fuss-free experience. 

You can not only manage all kinds of messages (SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail, Yahoo mail, and 3rd party apps), but also find your contacts easily and make a phone call or view your call log in the new APUS Message Center. You only need this one application to grasp all the necessary functions. 

If you are always jumping between SMS, WhatsAppp, Facebook Messenger, etc. Please try APUS Message Center right now! APUS Message Center brings you a more intelligent, easier and smarter experience. 

Key FeaturesÔºö


‚ñ∑Message Management (Support Dual SIM) 

APUS Message Center provides not only free text service such as SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook and instant messages but also email apps such as Gmail. APUS Message Center fully supports dual SIM devices for SMS, so you won‚Äôt miss any important messages. And it is also easy to search for contacts and message texts from dual SIM card. 

‚ñ∑Contact Manager

In APUS Message Center, you can find one contact‚Äôs multiple social information and connect with them by dragging to the app you want. Eg. SMS, Dialer, Line, WeChat, WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, etc. 
‚ñ∑Notification Management 

APUS Message Center also provides notification manager.It will clean your unimprortant notifications from your notification bar and help you get rid of messy notifications. 

‚ñ∑Phone Calling

After you check a missed call or chatting with someone, you can directly make a phone call and view your call log in APUS Message Center. 

‚ñ∑Group Messaging

Tired for your orderless notification bar? Try APUS Message Center now, you can check any notification (Gmail, WeChat, WhatsApp, Skype, Facebook messenger, instant messaging, etc ) you want by using APUS Message Center. It will always organize your important messages so that you can read more simply and conveniently find all notifications at one stop any time. 

‚ñ∑Quick Reply

When there is a new message from SMS or WhatsApp, a message bubble will pop up to remind you to view the notification. Then you can read and reply messages of SMS and WhatsApp from pop-up notification bubble, without exiting the current app, and quick reply the message directly. 

‚ñ∑Regular Reminder for Messages 

Notification bar will push so many notifications everyday, what if you miss some important messages? Don‚Äôt worry, APUS Message Center always reminds you about the messages from these app: Messages, Call, WeChat, Gmail,  WhatsApp, Facebook messenger, Twitter, Snapchat, Skype,  Tinder and so on. 

You‚Äôll never miss important calls or unread messages (SMS, Gmail, Yahoo mail, social media apps notification)! 

‚ñ∑Easy Search

Within just one second, you can find notifications, Messages, SMS, Contacts, Calls, email (such as Yahoo mail and Gmail) without fuss by entering keywords. All messages and contacts are collected in one app. 

APUS Message Center is an intelligent, simple, easy and fast messenger and message management tool for android, comes with collecting all messages, such as SMS and 3rd party apps messages. You can enjoy contact manager, phone calling, regular notifications, dual sim support, quick reply, group messages. 

The conversation apps currently supported by APUS Message Center include but not limited: WhatsApp, Hike, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, Wechat, QQ, Skype, LinkedIn, Imo, Kakao, VK, Tinder, Yandex mail, Hangouts and more. 

Contact usÔºö
- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/APUSGROUP
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/apusgroup
- Mail: apusmsgcenter@gmail.com
- Official website: http://www.apusapps.com

comments: I am sad to say that this app has some nice qualities, but I am very disappointed right now. I wanted to like this app, but I was robbed of a win on their lucky spin wheel! The wheel landed on a $50 Amazon gift card and then, as if to say "Oops just kidding" it makes a rapid jump to the next prize of 15 coins! What the hell!! Even the "shout outs" mentioned my name and the $50 I was suppose to have won, but was just swiped away from right under me!! Also they practically force a 5 star rating!!

Doesn't seem to support sharing MMS or locations, separates combined contacts so be prepared for lots of duplicates. I Don't want an app that doesn't support the best features that come with our stock messaging apps but it adds several unnecessary features like optimizer and booster, which most phones already come with. The app keeps closing as I'm typing this. 3rd time having to reopen. Definitely not recommended. Uninstalling!
I miss the old version this new app is sinking i cant see what i am typing unless i use quick or pop reply

ASAP kept stopping over and over a couldn't even type messages without its stating that there is no problem with this app I really like this at first what is the problem with this app why did it do that

So it felt a little misleading. I was hoping that this app would have all of my accounts in one place. Allowing me to remove all other apps. This app just provides you with notifications. It's like a watcher app. I don't need that I wanted one app that allowed me to login to everything and handle direct messaging with it.

title: AT&T Messages for Tablet
description:
With AT&T Messages you can send and receive text and pictures messages from your tablet or computer. Your messages are stored in the network so you can continue the conversation even when you switch devices. AT&T Messages uses your AT&T mobile number, so whether you send messages from your phone, tablet or computer, everyone will know the message is from you.

To use AT&T Messages on your Android tablet (version 4.4 of the Android operating system and higher), press install, then open the app and log in using your AT&T User ID and you are ready to go!

Key Features: 
‚Ä¢ AT&T Messages uses your mobile phone number regardless of which device you use. 
‚Ä¢ View, manage and respond to messages from your phone, tablet or computer. For example, start a text message conversation on your phone and continue it on your tablet, or manage messages online and text a response from your computer.
‚Ä¢ Users of the AT&T Messages Android phone app also have their voicemail messages included in their message inbox. Voicemail shows up as visual voicemail in your inbox so you can select which one you want to listen to from your phone, tablet or computer.
‚Ä¢ Conversations are organized by person - Communications are organized by person and sorted by when you receive them.
Requires Android 4.4 OS or higher tablet. Your texts are copied to and stored in your network inbox so that they are available on the web and tablet. If you no longer want your messages copied to your network inbox, visit www.att.com/messagesfaq for details on how to remove the service. An unlimited messaging plan is highly recommended with this application. Compatible device required. Standard messaging and data rates apply. For details, go to att.com/messages.
AT&T products and services are provided or offered by subsidiaries and affiliates of AT&T Inc. under the AT&T brand and not by AT&T Inc. ¬© 2014 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved. AT&T, the AT&T logo and all other marks contained herein are trademarks of AT&T Intellectual Property and/or AT&T affiliated companies.
http://www.att.com/messagesterms
The collection, use, and disclosure of any personal information through this application is governed by AT&T's Privacy Policy found at att.com/privacy.

title: SMS Message & Call Screening
description:
The SMS Message app takes you back to the retro Android messaging experience for SMS, MMS and video messages. 

This SMS app for Android is completely free, and has all the features you will ever need. Send text messages, attach files, pictures, recordings and much more. The app delivers text messages directly via the mobile network, so no Internet or Wi-Fi connection is needed*.

One of the advanced functions of this feature-rich smart SMS Message app is that it instantly shows the latest SMS exchanged between you and a contact when you make or receive a call. This handy feature can help you remember important details before you start talking. 

Our text message app helps you avoid unwanted calls too. The caller ID screen displays at each call with real-time information about who is calling, even if the caller isn‚Äôt in your phonebook. This is a great way to identify unknown numbers or nuisance calls. You can also instantly save or message new contacts to your phonebook with just one click. 

SMS Message is the perfect choice for anyone looking for a clear and user-friendly app to send old-school SMS, MMS or video messages. 

SMS Message Top Features:
‚Ä¢ Multi-format messaging: Send SMS, MMS, and videos instantly.
‚Ä¢ One click to instantly text a caller after each call. No need to insert number again. Easy!
‚Ä¢ Latest SMS: When receiving a call see the latest SMS between you and the caller.
‚Ä¢ Powerful Caller ID: Effectively identifies numbers in real-time ‚Äì even those not in your contact list.
‚Ä¢ Spam warning: Get warnings for millions of spam numbers worldwide.
‚Ä¢ Save contacts: Save unknown incoming contacts with one click after each call.
‚Ä¢ Re-dial number: One click number re-dial.
‚Ä¢ Available on all Android devices.

To offer you the best SMS messenger & communication experience, SMS Message needs to access Phone, Contacts and Location permissions. Please note that you can always adjust caller ID and SMS to your preferences in the app settings, or directly in the settings on the after-call screen.

*Your service provider may charge you for sending offline SMS messages depending on your contract with them. Please check with your service provider regarding any charges you may receive.
descriptionHTML:
The SMS Message app takes you back to the retro Android messaging experience for SMS, MMS and video messages.

This SMS app for Android is completely free, and has all the features you will ever need. Send text messages, attach files, pictures, recordings and much more. The app delivers text messages directly via the mobile network, so no Internet or Wi-Fi connection is needed*.

One of the advanced functions of this feature-rich smart SMS Message app is that it instantly shows the latest SMS exchanged between you and a contact when you make or receive a call. This handy feature can help you remember important details before you start talking.

Our text message app helps you avoid unwanted calls too. The caller ID screen displays at each call with real-time information about who is calling, even if the caller isn‚Äôt in your phonebook. This is a great way to identify unknown numbers or nuisance calls. You can also instantly save or message new contacts to your phonebook with just one click.

SMS Message is the perfect choice for anyone looking for a clear and user-friendly app to send old-school SMS, MMS or video messages.

SMS Message Top Features:
‚Ä¢ Multi-format messaging: Send SMS, MMS, and videos instantly.
‚Ä¢ One click to instantly text a caller after each call. No need to insert number again. Easy!
‚Ä¢ Latest SMS: When receiving a call see the latest SMS between you and the caller.
‚Ä¢ Powerful Caller ID: Effectively identifies numbers in real-time ‚Äì even those not in your contact list.
‚Ä¢ Spam warning: Get warnings for millions of spam numbers worldwide.
‚Ä¢ Save contacts: Save unknown incoming contacts with one click after each call.
‚Ä¢ Re-dial number: One click number re-dial.
‚Ä¢ Available on all Android devices.

To offer you the best SMS messenger & communication experience, SMS Message needs to access Phone, Contacts and Location permissions. Please note that you can always adjust caller ID and SMS to your preferences in the app settings, or directly in the settings on the after-call screen.

*Your service provider may charge you for sending offline SMS messages depending on your contract with them. Please check with your service provider regarding any charges you may receive.
summary: The best free text message app for SMS and MMS messages, and identifying calls

title: Private Message Box : Hide SMS
description:
Do you want to hide your private conversations? Worried on messages from one friend checked by others, then Private Message Box is for you. It saves SMS/MMS/Call Logs of secret contacts behind PIN pad.

To keep secret messages and calls of particular number, add it as Private Contact. After that when any new message received from that contact, it directly move inside application. Its easy to use and keeps user conversation secret. Your SMS and call conversation is 100% SECRET and secure.

Incoming/Outgoing Messages will automatically hide. You can customize notification icon/sound.

It also provides free texting between App Users. Just Sign-In with your number. Send unlimited text,audio,photo and location details to another user.


Full of emoj characters (300 emoj support), useful to represent emotions.

Features
- Free text & Multimedia Messaging between Users
- Auto backup
- Image/Audio/Location sharing
- Open PSB using any web browser
- Password protection: hidden mail box with no app icon, cannot be seen or opened by other people
- Timeout: set a timer to close Application
- Messages move back and forth from stock app.
- Privacy Guard

Excited to receive feedbacks or queries at: info@privatesmsbox.com

comments: Used to be a great app even with ads. With the latest update, a loud, full screen, video ad pops up every time I click on a message. But a full screen video ad every time I click on a message is just egregious.
