comments: I like it better than my stock option as privacy is nice but it doesn't do well with images and videos. Some bugs to fix there. And sometimes it won't open GIFs. And sometimes it won't unlock private even after multiple attempts without closing the app and restarting. But I like it. I've tried others and they aren't as good. And I don't have to give my phone number and get a text code or register to use it. Nice
Contacts in private all messages will be deleted upon uninstalling the app. Although you can get them back if your reinstall the app, just remove it from private. Thank god!
Not bad, but does not capitalize the first letter during typing n also cant send messages direct from contact, it will ask you to add number again

In the Private Box Setting under Notification, you can adjust the notification, whether you want it to have a sound, vibrate it or keep it silent. When I tried to turn off the sound in the General Notification Panel, you can still hear a sound. Every number has its individual setting. Can you automatically turn off the sound for all the numbers if in the General Notification Setting is set to silent mode? There are lot of things to do if you have lots of numbers stored in the Private Box. Thanks

Not worth the money. This app has too many flaws for me to want to spend money on it. Sometimes I would not receive a new message alert. One time I did get an alert but there was nothing there, until I checked again 10 min later. There has been times that I've tried to send a text and the app says it's an invalid number despite the number being in my phone book. If they could resolve these issues it would be a nice app.

title: Messenger SMS & MMS
description:
Messenger SMS & MMS is an instant messaging app for android. Its a great Messaging app.
Fully customizable by you! Send 3000+ new emojis, funny faces, stickers, GIFs &text messages via SMS messages. Sending funny SMS messages. Sending picture, audio, video MMS messages to share the amazing moment. Sending GIFs and emoji messages to express yourself better. A funny SMS messages app to replace stock messages app!

Messenger SMS & MMS: Send messages safely with private box, SMS blocker, even SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS.
Texting SMS messages has never been so great with countless emoji, GIF, sticker, theme, private box, SMS blocker, SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! Enjoy sending & blocking text messages with funny SMS messages.

Messenger SMS & MMS Key Features:
-Backup & Restore
+ Backup SMS & MMS messages to cloud, messages never get lost
+ Restore deleted or lost SMS & MMS message whenever
- Caller ID
+ Identify numbers in real time - even those not in your contact list
+ Get warnings for more than 1 million spam numbers worldwide
- Calls with Messages
+ One click text a contact after each call. No need to input number again
+ Access other Messages features directly from caller ID screen
- Schedule SMS
+ Delayed SMS message give opportunity to correct the wrong message
+ Never miss any big moment with schedule SMS Messages
- Private Box
+ Encrypt messages or contacts & lock down with private box
+ Hide private box icon to protect privacy from being snooped
- SMS Blocker
+ No worry about spam messages consume storage space with blocker
+ Block text messages via adding to SMS blocker
- Free Funny sms collection
+ 20+ categories SMS messages you can choose
+ Love SMS, flirt SMS, romantic SMS, friendship SMS, greeting SMS and more
- Funny Emoji Message
+ Fast text 5000+ funny face, emoji & emoticons from messages directly
+ Great display of funny face, emoji & emoticons in text message
- Funny Messages:
+ Messages support all new funny emoji & funny face in SMS
+ Support update multiple emoji in SMS
+ Support Unicorn, Middle Finger, Taco Rainbow and more funny emoji
- Free Animated GIF & Emoji ART
+ Share thousands of trending hot GIFs MMS via MMS
+ Share unique Emoji Art & funny face with friends via SMS
- Customization SMS Themes
+ Tons of amazing messaging themes
+ Customize SMS background as you wish
- Messages Customization
+ Customize texting bubble, SMS bubble, color, font & wallpaper
+ Take photo as wallpaper or choose wallpaper from photo gallery
- Auto reply messages:
+ Driving Mode disable message notifications from messages or stock messages except phone call
+ Auto Reply when Driving Mode is turned on, keep distractions to a minimum
- MORE FEATURES
+ Send picture, audio, video MMS messages to more than one friends for once time
+ Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste text messages
+ Pop up new message for a quick view and quick reply
+ Quick search to find exactly what you are looking for in free text messages
+ Custom bubble themes.
+ Support all emojis, send and receive emoji with your friend.
+ Custom font for conversation list, thread, popup message dialog.
+ Beautiful popup message dialog, support more pages popup dialog.
+ Blink LED when new message arrived.

comments: This is a good app, and it definitely has potential! However, I am disappointed with the following; (too many ads) that there is no remove ads with purchase option, when you lock an SMS convo with a passcode by tapping on the unlocked padlock icon - it prompts you to set a password. You have to enter this password everytime to see the conversation. My issue is that there is no "permanent" unlock the convo feature after it's been locked. I'll rate 5 stars when the developer fixes these issues.

Its perfect for keeping in contact with my son while hes gone and thats so awesome 5 stars for me. I wish you could add the feature screen share while on facetime so that the both people can watch a movie together while on facetime. That would be so great if they could add that cus I had it for my LG G5 but my Samsung A70 doesnt have this feature and its newer phone so Im confused. Anyways my point is that its amazing and great in everyway. Its awesome for when they are away from Home

Response to message doesnt work. Message sent but still says sending. Contact name doesn't show for some contacts but when pressing the number, the info shows that it actually is a saved contact. No delayed sending option. No pin to top option. Really no options other than customization. Uninstalling. Going back to the stock messaging app.

A super clean, beautiful interface w/ optional themes available at your disposal. Nothing to cluttered or clunky either, as it's all very well optimized. No lag. No annoying plug-ins/extensions or integrated ads planted within the interface. Ultimately a great app with no nonsense from the dev's. Definitely a step up from the native stock app on my S9+. Gripes: Photos are organized by album rather than date. Ads Redundant emoji button. We already have one. Contacts don't update quickly.

I love this app. It does everything that I need it to do. But I have to comment on these stupid huge emojis that keep popping up. They are pissing me off because they keep popping up when Im trying to text and I keep hitting them. Please get rid of them. Other thank that its great I can talk to my kids that are to young for an actual phone.üòÅ Its the only app I use for video chatting. And sometimes I completely forget that I cant call people on my phone and just use the app instead.

title: Messages
description:
Text from your phone ‚Äì a completely new messaging experience. its Signal Private Messenger. Fast SMS brings a refreshingly beautiful and responsive Material Design touch to the stale state of text messaging.

‚Ä¢ Whisper in the shadows ‚Äì Switch to the dark theme if you refuse to see the light. The app lets you send SMS/MMS text messages from any of it's clients via your android phone.

With Messages For Samsung you can send/receive text messages on your phone using your current phone number. Your SMS inbox is synced with your phone and always up to date, no matter from which device you send your messages.

Messaging enables, quick, reliable SMS, MMS and RCS messaging from your phone

You may be at a location where it is too loud or too quiet to speak out loud, and all you really need to pass along a simple message to someone near you.

Think about a place like a nightclub or a construction site, or an event like a soccer game or a concert, where it may be too loud to speak normally. Maybe you are stuck in a boring meeting in a conference room or a library where it is not polite to speak. 

Simply start the app, type in the message or question, and tap the 'show' button. SMS Messages brings a refreshingly beautiful and Messages Ringtone. Messages App is the best Message recovery app.

Your messages can include photos, videos, documents, audio, and contacts, and you can even see when your message has been delivered and when someone‚Äôs typing a reply. With end-to-end encryption, your iMessage conversations stay safe and private. And those green SMS text messages on your Android.

Your benefits with my sms for android:
- Send and receive text messages.
- Automatic sync between your smartphone, tablet and computer
- Call notifications on your phone - when you receive a call on your phone
- MMS Group chat and multimedia support 
-Get all SMS and MMS to read and Display single conversation.
-Sending Text/MMS messages.
- Messages Themes
- Instant calling functionality.

Think about a place like a nightclub or a construction site, or an event like a soccer game or a concert, where it may be too loud to speak normally. Maybe you are stuck in a boring meeting in a conference room or a library where it is not polite to speak.

Simply start the app, type in the message or question, and tap the 'show' button. SMS Messages brings a refreshingly beautiful and Messages Ringtone. Messages App is the best Message recovery app.

Your messages can include photos, videos, documents, audio, and contacts, and you can even see when your message has been delivered and when someone‚Äôs typing a reply. With end-to-end encryption, your iMessage conversations stay safe and private. And those green SMS text messages on your Android.

Your benefits with my sms for android:
- Send and receive text messages.
- Automatic sync between your smartphone, tablet and computer
- Call notifications on your phone - when you receive a call on your phone
- MMS Group chat and multimedia support
-Get all SMS and MMS to read and Display single conversation.

- Messages Themes
- Instant calling functionality.
- Manage Delete all messages and particular one message.
- Change app theme and emojis.
- Manage keyboard to sending message to close or not.
- Find out your favorite contact message.

title: Message Lock (SMS Lock)
description:
‚òÖ Lock your messages from prying eyes ‚òÖ

Do your friends always borrow your phone to play games? Do you concern your short messages may be read by people you do not want to?
SMS Lock helps you out!

SMS Lock is a light tool to protect your personal short messages (SMS & MMS).
The cute lock is designed upon Android system level, to provide fully privacy protection to your short message box (Messaging). After enabling SMS Lock, there will be lock pattern protection when opening short message apps.

- New locking engine

comments: This app would be perfect if it didn't jump to the unlock screen everytime I get a text message. No matter what I'm doing on my phone it immediately interrupts it and jumps to the unlock screen for every message. There is nothing in the settings to stop it. That is a silly feature. I always get text messages which means I'm always getting interrupted with that blue unlock screen, super annoying. Unfortunately I dont see myself keeping this app much longer.
Good most of the time. Sometimes doesn't work and you can access everything that should have been "Safe"

App selects MAX SIX msg apps on your phone. You can NOT change the six it chooses ... Period. No type of settings. The Flip side: for the six apps it does choose to lock. You will have to enter the password LITterally every time. Even after you have unlocked the phone and the desired app.

been using this app for years already. But after I updated my phone I can't unlock my messages using fingerprints, only pattern. it always says "register fingerprint before enable" even though I already registered my fingerprints.

This app uses a pattern to lock certain apps. Only used if for the text messages. Biggest issue is it pops up anytime you get a message so if you are in the middle of something you it interrupts. It's very very annoying!

title: Messenger Kids ‚Äì The Messaging App for Kids
description:
Made for Kids. Controlled by Parents.
 
Parent Dashboard:
Parents can manage their kids' contact list, and monitor messages on the Messenger Kids app. When kids block contacts, parents are notified.

Fun Filters:
Kid-friendly filters, reactions, and sound effects make video chats with friends and family even better.

Parents can set usage limits when it‚Äôs bedtime, and there are no in app-purchases or ads.

Easy Start:
No phone number required.

We‚Äôre always working to improve Messenger Kids. If you‚Äôd like to share any feedback with us or for more information, visit messengerkids.com.

comments: I love messenger kids because it has things to do while you are talking with your friends. An example of this is when I was bored talking to my friend, so I started a game! Another Thing I love about this app is that you can type in your friends names to request to talk with them. So easy! Download now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Great idea needs work. While in the app it lists some of my kids contacts but not all of them. It also does not open chat heads or give any kind of notification when someone sends a message while you aren't on you don't know I have multiple kids so as a parent it's frustrating trying to manage their accounts. If I manage one it signs me into theirs as them and then won't let me sign out to check on another ones account. I had to uninstall and reinstall. It has lots of potential but needs work.

I love how this app is helping my kids stay connected with their friends during the shelter in place. I don't like that the tablet constantly rings when my young son is trying to take a turn playing on the tablet & there is no way to turn it off temporarily or put it on silent. When it has been ringing & you open the tablet the app automatically opens, I don't like that. You can set a sleep mode but "weekends" are Friday and Saturday & "weekdays" are Sun-Thurs, I need M-F after school hrs.

I like the app and all, but I wish video chat was full screen like regular video chats are. Also, instead of you having to take a picture as your profile, I wish you could just like put any photo in your gallery instead of having to take a picture of yourself or something. If you guys just edit these things, it would probably be the best messaging app for kids, and for me.

SO AMAZING! I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT YOU CAN CHAT WITH PEOPLE JUST BY ENTERING A CODE! Just enter a code and boom! You can now chat with another person! It's that easy! There is some ads but they never occur when you are chatting or typing! You can even see when someone sent a message just by CLICKING THE MESSAGE!!!!I rated this five stars for a reason! DOWNLOAD NOW!!!

title: Messaging+ 7 Free - SMS, MMS
description:
It is an flat style Message app. Cool flat style UI. It is very simple to use.

FEATURE:

 - Cool Flat style UI. 
 - Custom bubble themes.
 - Support all emojis, send and receive emoji with your friend.
 - Custom font for conversation list, thread, popup message dialog.
 - Beautiful popup message dialog, support more pages popup dialog.
 - Blink LED when new message arrived.
 - Internal snapshot support.
 - Manage all SMS message conveniently.
 - Group message support. 
 - LED support. 
 - Custom any color for bubble. 

Important Note:

Menu key:

 - To access the hardware menu button in Galaxy S5, you can simply tap and hold Recent apps button.

Emoji problem:

 - Press the menu and select "Insert Smile", Or press the attach button.
 - Emoji message will block by network carrier when across network carriers, please try ask your friend to send emoji message to you by mms type message, if your friend can't see. please try to send mms type.

Out order of message problem:

 - If you don't need to see duplicate notifications, please try to enable "Setting - Receive settings - Block Sms Notification", Maybe it will cause two duplicate message on some devices.

 - If your message is out of order, please try to select "Block Sms Notification" option in settings.

developerAddress: Room 607 Yen Sheng Centre, 64 Hoi Yuen Road., Kwun Tong
recentChanges: Fix bugs
comments: Lots of eye candy, really like it. Unable to send group texts, this option is not available. Monthly subscription for a message app?! Really?! One time fee is much more appropriate. Have to switch back to another message app to send group texts. Bummer!
Everything looks good. Until I try to customize my chat. I can't use a personal wallpaper. Im only given a small range of themes to choose from.
Besides the ad bar this is an excellent app. Even the ad bar really isn't much of an issue. Easy to ignore if you want.
I agree with another recent reviewer. I want to be able to see how an app works before I designate it as the default. Uninstalling.

This is an update: I love this app it's like if it's spreading through the now when someone calls the design of it is totally different I love the design of it but overall I love it and I do intend to keep this app for good KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK

title: Messages - SMS:MMS
description:
Messages - SMS:MMS with the latest and newest features.....

Messages - SMS:MMS   - Messages, text and video chat free app will help all users open their popular messenger & Social Media in one place applications.

Quickly open all your Messenger via Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Hangouts, Snapchat, Viber and other 50+ messenger app. Messenger Messenger is a FREE Messenger Text, Messaging Free Chat Text Messages app.

Messages - SMS:MMS is a connection of all your messenger apps like Twitter, Facebook, Viber, Whatsapp Messenger, and much more, give you an access to a world though Messenger.

Messages - SMS:MMS also provided security,Messenger App lock is security tool which helps you to protect your phone from annoying people by locking your applications from public access.

Messages - SMS:MMS also includes other free apps, such as news media and shopping apps. You can check news and go shopping easily without installing many apps

FEATURES:
- Simple chart showing Messages-messenger app use
- Fast access from any screen 
- Messenger  is easy to use.
- Multiple Apps supported
- Send FREE Messages to all you favorite instant messenger apps from 
one messaging app
- Messenger is an all in one messages App for Android
- Messenger cooperates with more than 50+ messaging apps

 you just need one click to open your Messages - SMS:MMS whenever you want.Messenger is a free app to manage all your chat and social apps in one place.soyou always stay in touch with your friends & family.

This Messenger app also shows you your usage statistics of major messenger and social media applications like Facebook Messenger,whatsapp, Pinterest, WeChat, Kik,  Telegram, Whatsapp,  etc
Adding your favorite app, our messenger app will help you keep in touch with all your friends from Twitter , Facebook, Snapchat , Instagram, Whatsapp and more.

title: Easy Message - Quick send messages to phone number
description:
Are you annoyed of not being able to send whatsapp message without saving contact?

We have got you covered. Now you can quickly send messages to any phone number which are not in your contact list. Use ‚ÄúEasy Message‚Äù App and send direct whatsapp message to unsaved phone number. Easy Message app is a convenient app for those who do not want to save a phone number to contacts before they send whatsapp message.

Here is how to use it. Open the app, enter phone number, press start chat in whatsapp. The app will redirect you to whatsapp chat. Isn‚Äôt it hassle free?

To make it more seamless, this direct whatsapp message app allows you to simply copy the phone number from anywhere in your clipboard and simply paste it in the app to send whatsapp message to any phone number.

Whatsapp will notify you if the new phone number does not exist on whatsapp. Easy Message app makes your life convenient. We know it‚Äôs a feels like a daunting task to add a temporary number in order to send whatsapp message. Your contact list is flooded with lots of unnecessary contacts just because you needed to send whatsapp message to them once. Now send direct whatsapp message to any phone number effortlessly.

We all have been in situations where we need to save a phone number temporarily. We were to send whatsapp message to a cab driver, a handyman, delivery boy, a stranger to whom we forwarded a message or anyone temporarily and we had to save the new phone number in contact list. Isn‚Äôt it odd when these temporarily saved contacts starts viewing your whatsapp statuses? No more unnecessary contacts. Send direct whatsapp messages to any phone number without saving with Easy Message app.

‚úì User Friendly App
‚úì Send Direct whatsapp message
‚úì Copy and paste new phone number
‚úì Send whatsapp message without saving contact
‚úì Get rid of unnecessary phone numbers
‚úì Quick send messages for FREE

Isn‚Äôt it the best gift of new year 2019? Download Easy Message App NOW!

* This app is not related to WhatsApp in any way.

description:
Viber is the FREE, simple, fast and most secure messaging and calling app. The messenger of choice for over 1 billion users worldwide! Text now for free and make high-quality crystal-clear phone calls. 

Viber is completely free. All you need is a data plan or Wi-Fi connection and you‚Äôre good to go. Make free international calls, send text messages, open a group chat, and so much more! Download Viber today to connect with people, no matter who they are, or where they are from.

With Viber you will have access to unlimited calls, endless texting and high quality video chat!

Why is Viber a perfect text and video messenger for you? 

Fully Synced Desktop and Tablet Apps
Viber is fully synced to your computer and laptop. You can see all your messages and calls, and chat with them directly from your desktop or Android tablet.

Make Free Audio and Video Calls
Make crystal-clear audio and instant video calls to friends and family for free! Live chat is a great opportunity to stay connected.

Make Low-cost Calls to Landlines with Viber Out
Call landlines, non-Viber users or anyone who doesn‚Äôt have an internet service or a mobile phone with Viber Out‚Äôs low-cost international calling service. 

Send Free Messages
Staying in touch has never been easier. Send a free text message, share a photo, a sticker or GIF, a video or any other file. Viber is a great alternative for the fans of sms texting!

Open a Group Chat
Catch up with friends, family and coworkers by opening a group chat for up to 250 members. Talk and text together!

Chat and Call with 100% Privacy
Thanks to end-to-end encryption, any type of information you share on Viber will always remain between yourself and the person you‚Äôre talking to. Any message you send makes its way from your device to the recipient‚Äôs in the form of an encrypted code that only their device can translate to plain text using an encryption key. Encryption keys exist only on user devices and nowhere else. So, no one ‚Äî not even Viber ‚Äî can read your messages.

Self-Destruct Your Secret Chats
Start a Secret Chat which will let you set a self-destruct timer for every message in your conversation so that after your message is read, it‚Äôs automatically deleted from your recipient‚Äôs phone. Viber is safe! We support encrypted messaging to make sure your data is private.

Express Yourself with GIFs and Viber Stickers
Words can only say so much! Express your every emotion with endless GIFs and over 35,000 stickers from the Viber Sticker Market. Chatting is more fun than you think!

Start a Viber Community with Unlimited Members
No matter what you‚Äôre interested in, you can now start your own Viber Community! Interact with an unlimited number of people, about a shared topic or passion. Enjoy more admin controls than ever before as well as new conversation features in a unique chat space where you get to call all the shots. 

Enrich Your Conversation with Chat Extensions
Spice up your conversations with a variety of useful Chat Extensions including easy access to your favorite links, special Viber stickers, GIFs and videos, Yelp, YouTube, Booking, Spotify and more. 

Viber Out Subscriptions are a bundle of minutes to call a specific destination, which are purchased in-app and renew monthly or weekly depending on your plan. If you subscribe via play store, payment will be charged to your account when the purchase is confirmed. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your Account will be charged for this renewal up to 24 hours before the end of the current period at the rate of your selected plan. You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal at any time by going to your Play Store Account settings on your device.

Viber is part of the Rakuten Group, a world leader in e-commerce and financial services.
Install Viber Free Messenger Now and Start Connecting!

recentChanges:
We doubled the max participants for Viber Group Calls to 20 people at once so it's easier and safer for you to connect with others at this time.

Additionally, we have something for you that we've been meaning to release for a while now... Drumroll please!

Now introducing the video trimmer on Viber - so all your videos are just the right length.
comments: I have used Viber for text and voice calls for many years now. I have been mostly satisfied with the overall performance of the app, however, the app has been very leggy lately. Messages sent and recieved mostly do not appear at all or appear a few hours later or some times even next day. Photos sent keep uploading and then 'failed to send' notification appears and photos recieved do not download. I have checked if I have 4g or wifi issues, but I don't. I t is the app issue. Please fix.

Glad to see that emojis have been updated. However, the "Last seen" status is a feature that is still completely messed up: it always shows that someone is online or was active a few minutes ago, even though he has been inactive for a while (even if he hasn't touched his phone for hours). And while I write a message to someone, Viber does not update his status and shows that he is online even if he is not any more. Still needs improvements.

Have used Viber for years now, however in the last 24 hours it's become unusable. It freezes my entire Pixel 4 while replying to a message, or it will freeze while typing a reply. It also force shuts itself with a "Viber is not responding" pop up. Really frustrating as the majority of my family and friends use this app and not being able to reply to any of my messages is very annoying.

Ok they reverted back. Thank you. Old review : last version took away "attach my location" to a message option. Was the only reason I used this app. Other similar apps are better at other things. Viber removed a feature and does not even mention it in the update. Viber is taking any options/features that made it better then others out. Businesses work on features that differentiate their product, Viber works on make their product same or worse then others by taking features away. genius!

BRING BACK DOODLE FEATURE, PLEASE! No matter I set picture quality on excellent, it's still poor quality when I receive it. Just add original quality, not low, medium, excellent or whatever. For video it's even worse. When I receive video, the same has much worse quality than original file that was sent to me. ADD ORIGINAL QUALITY for sending / receiving photos and videos, WHERE DO YOU LIVE? And ADS IN THE MIDDLE OF THE MESSAGES, really? Annoying and not good at all. üò† Bring back Doodle!!!

title: TextU - Private SMS Messenger, Call app
description:
TextU - one of the best all-in-one messenger app to replace stock messages! It is a secured SMS & free text messenger keeping your messages from snooping.

TextU ‚Äì Send text messages safely with private box, SMS blocker, even SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! You can also register with your phone to unlock free online messages. 

===== Key Features of TextU =====

- SECURE MESSAGES
‚úî All messages are encrypted for secure purpose
‚úî No one could take snapshot for your messages

- Default PHONE HANDLER- 
Embedded dialpad that directly make a phone call with dual-sim support
Well designed calling and in call screen
Clear call logs for your private contacts after each phone call

- FUNNY EMOJI MESSAGE
‚úî Fast text 3000+ lenny face, emoji & emoticons from messages directly
‚úî Great display of lenny face, emoji & emoticons in text message

- SMS BACKUP & RESTORE

‚úî Restore your backup messages whenever

- MORE FEATURES
‚úî Send picture, audio, video MMS messages
‚úî Lock your messages app with Patterns
‚úî Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste text messages
‚úî Quick search to find exactly what you are looking for

‚ù§Contact Us
Please feel free to contact us with email hi@melonsapp.com. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any design or features of TextU, do rate us ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ on play store.

comments: Themes and effects are great. But i don't see group sending of messages. Since im using huawei y9 phone, camera automatically popped up upon opening of private messages.

15/03/20 - I'm giving this App ( ONE ‚≠ê STAR) at the moment purely on the fact I've just installed the app and I want to see how it works out. I've read some reviews that's why I thought I'd give it a whirl. What I've tested so far is good and I like the setup of it all, but I would like to redesign the sms part like what you can do on the NEXT SMS app so you make your own designs as I'm not a big fan on bubble texts I like it to be just the text only but I'll try it and if it grows on me.

My texts are going through twice on group chats. Photos are not being sent/received. I like the customizable options. I thought whoever received the text could not screen shot but it's only on my phone which is dumb, why would I turn on an option to limit myself. Also I'm not receiving notifications for all texts.

Update: looking for something else because 1) writing button should float on bottom, it's too far for thumb access, 2) needs option to have notifications be strictly on bar and then offer the ablility to pull down for additional details as opposed to notifications being shown as an overlaying reply box 3) needs a landscape mode for conversation list, 4) cannot create a group chats, 5) cannot search conversations, 6) cannot hide phone numbers, 7) no support

Remember that SMS texts means SHORT MESSAGE SERVICE. If you write long texts and send media, you may want to consider installing an MMS text messaging application. MMS allows more information to be delivered to the recipient without jumbled words or letters.

title: Private Text Messaging + Secure Texting & Calling
description:
CoverMe Private Text Messaging + Secure Texting & Calling is a private messenger for private texts & calls from a burner line. Better private messaging experience with disappearing messages, encrypted messages, anonymous sms, etc. Hide secret text messages, private call logs, and personal contacts from prying eyes. Everything is end-to-end encrypted on CoverMe Private Messenger. 

‚Ä¢ Send private texts from a burner phone number
‚Ä¢ Make secure private phone calls with a private phone number
‚Ä¢ Send disappearing messages, recall sent messages
‚Ä¢ End-to-end encrypt all secret sms & messages
‚Ä¢ Shake to lock personal private text messages
‚Ä¢ Private vault to hide photos, videos, passwords and any files 
‚Ä¢ Disguise CoverMe with a mask app to hide all secrets and privacy

Private Phone Number as Burner Line
Get a real US or Canada phone number to hide your primary number for anonymous secret text & call. CoverMe Private Text Messaging + Secure Texting & Calling provides burner phone numbers with various area codes, perfect for business, online dating (OkCupid, Tinder, Zoosk‚Ä¶) and any other situation to have your privacy better secured. You can change the disposable phone number any time. 

Private Calling
Make secure anonymous wifi phone calls to US, Canada and China with a disposable burner line, with superior clarity to existing regular phone service. Your call logs won‚Äôt show up on your phone bill. 

Private Texting
Send unlimited secret sms and anonymous texts with a real burner phone number to keep your personal number private. Your private text messages are off the record. 

Disappearing Messages
CoverMe private messenger allows your fully messaging control. You will immediately know when the recipient has read your messages. You can make your sent message disappear itself once it was read. Never worry about private text messages being spread around or stored! 
Ever sent a private picture or poorly judged text message to someone by accident? No problem ‚Äì just recall the messages!

End-to-end Encryption for Your Conversations
Regular calls & texts are delivered across unprotected phone networks and can be intercepted without your knowledge. By encrypted data transmission tech, calls and texts on CoverMe Private Messenger are highly protected and completely anonymous. Everything is end-to-end encrypted and safe from spying eyes and hackers.

Shake to Hide Secret Text Messages
Worried about prying eyes when texting on public? Just lock the private messaging app simply with a shake. You can even disguise CoverMe Private Messenger with a mask app so others won‚Äôt know you are using it. With decoy passwords, even if someone enters CoverMe, he cannot read your private messages or secret SMS. 

Private Vault for Extra Security
CoverMe Private Text Messaging + Secure Texting & Calling ensures your private photos & videos, passwords, personal contacts, confidential documents, notes, secret diary stay hidden and locked. The encrypted vault is completely impenetrable with a strong password. Even if your device is lost or left unattended, your private files are absolutely safe.

CoverMe Private Text Messaging + Secure Texting & Calling, make private things private!

____________________________________
‚ô• Learn more at http://www.coverme.ws
‚ô• Follow us at http://twitter.com/covermeapp
‚ô• Like us at http://facebook.com/covermemobile
‚ô• Google+ at https://plus.google.com/108768077336333941429
‚ô• Need Help? http://coverme.ws/support

4. Receive from non-CoverMe contacts.
comments: No respect for my privacy. Requires storage permission to do anything. Absolutely unacceptable. Uninstall. Reply : That's no excuse to require storage permissions before anything works. Also the password field uses a normal text box not a password box, and it has an undisclosed character limit that is quite small, and then the password is displayed on the screen. Overall I'm getting a pretty bad impression about security and privacy.

The most interesting feature about the app is that you need a password to access the app, it is safe. And when someone else tried to spy on your phone, you can simply shake to lock, very convenient private messenger app

it's nice to see someone making an effort to provide an encrypted messaging app. This private messenger app works well. There's always room for personalizing/improving messaging apps, but this one works just fine for me as I don't require anything fancy

Messaging, voice and video calling, disappearing message and much more, It is safe to call and text free in this private messenger app. best of all, decent privacy without 3rd parties constantly monitoring your communication.

As for privacy, only time is going to tell. I have been using this private messenger app for quite a long time since it launched at the first time, and I have recommended many people to use this app to get a burner phone number, call and text free with it

title: chomp SMS
description:
Want an ultra-customizable alternative to your stock Android SMS / MMS app?

Well today is your day. Join the chomp SMS revolution now at 10+ million strong!

Chomp comes with a bunch of great features, notably a passcode lock, privacy options, scheduled SMS sender (reminders, birthday wishes), stop a text while sending, pin favs to top, backup, blacklisting / SMS blocker, signatures, text snippets, quick reply popup (even on lock screen), multi-select picture gallery, dual sim, better MMS and GROUP messaging and much more....

Plus unlimited customisation options when receiving messages: change notification LED colors, ringtones, and vibrate patterns. In chomp you can also customize the screen color, font style, text size and background wallpaper. Go on give it some bling!

Plus the latest (2700+) Android, Twitter, Emoji One & iOS style emojis including diversity (skin tone). Just pick your preferred emoji style, easy!

Give chomp SMS a try today! It's pretty special.

Compatible with Yappy, Pushbullet and MightyText for desktop notifications and replying.

All chomp SMS features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to make a once only in-app purchase to remove ads forever.

Support, Knowledge Base & Feedback @ https://chomp.uservoice.com

comments: Get a notification at the top of my main screen showing a text, but when I open the app to see it, nothing is there. Sent an email to that address at 5:45 this morning, central US DST. I am able to receive messages this morning, but when I send them, I get a red '!' on the screen and a popup notice about something with APN settings, but it disappears before I can see much else.

Chomp rates right up there with my once-favorite texting app, which also used to promise "ad-free, for free, forever" once I bought it and ended up becoming a $59.95 annual subscription, so I'm skeptical. That said, the customization on a per-user basis is particularly useful and the primary reason I'd used the other product: I like knowing if it's a text message I can ignore or need to read. I'm not a fan of the inability to attach v-cards (VCF contact files), which is an on-going requirement for me as a Realtor and many others in the service space. Every salesperson wants to be able to give everybody they meet a card, and today that means getting my info into their phone! To accomplish that, I've got to select another messaging app and change it to default, then find and select send my card, and then switch back. WHAT A PAIN!! Even the native Samsung G10 app sends VCF!

I love chomp, been using it for years. Highly recommended it. But there is exactly one annoyance I wish could be fixed: when in a large group chat, if when someone "Likes" a message (presumably with Facebook messenger), it sends the entire message again 8 or 10 times. Usually large messages. I would think there should be a programmatical way to handle this that doesn't clutter the feed.

Purchased this app awhile ago and really like many of its features. Until today when I got caught up in a 13-way conversation with some people I didn't know. Turns out, you can't mute a conversation. That's an app killer for me. Had to switch to an onboard app which I really don't like. :-(

It's a great message app, hands down. The only thing I can't figure out is when I set my carrier limit to "carrier has no limit", it still won't send larger files. I think you guys should make it possible to send any file through your app, that would be the icing on this beautiful üç∞üòâ

title: Tablet Messenger
description:
Tablet Messenger is a multi-messenger app for Android tablets that synchronizes your messages in a bundled app and provides numerous settings

Supported Messenger:
WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, Skype, Telegram, GMail, Wire, Wechat, T-Online, GMX, web.de, Twitter, VK, ... More messengers will follow soon.

That's what the Tablet Messenger can do:

- Manage Messenger => Add, remove, or mute individual messengers

- Adjustments => Change font sizes and zoom into text or images

- Messages => Easily send and receive text and voice messages. Receive messages with notification - even if the app is running in the background or the display is disabled

- Security => Secure the Tablet Messenger and all messages with a password. No saving of user data


Just start:

1. Install
Install the Tablet Messenger on the Play Store on your tablet

2. Select
Select the messengers you want to use

3. Login
Register once with your messengers

And so the registration goes by the example WhatsApp:

1. Start the tablet messenger on your tablet and switch to the tab "WhatsApp". Wait until the QR code appears
2. Start WhatsApp on your phone
3. Open the menu on the right in the "Chats" tab on your mobile phone and select the menu item "WhatsApp Web"
4. Scan the QR code on the tablet with your mobile phone camera
5. The connection is made
6. Done
... from now on you will receive all your messages on your tablet


Your advantages:
- All Messenger: Switch easily between all your messengers

- always in sync: continue to receive messages with other devices

- clear: Use the large display and write comfortably with a large keyboard



If you have any questions, problems or suggestions, please send us an e-mail: support@tabletmessenger.com

We look forward to every message from you!

Useful tool but the app gets stuck sometimes and doesn't respond or crashes altogether. Otherwise it's a convenient app if youre using your phone as a hotspot for a tablet like I do in a place with no wifi and poor phone signal, it saves the agro of going to the phone all the time.
Very nice and really convenient. Only one big complaint though. Way too many ads and way too frequently. Other than that, awesome!!
This app does not allow you to text by itself; it requires another actual texting app already loaded on your tablet. If I had that I would not need this app.
quite easy to use and easy to set up. There are ads on Start up, however this usually dissapears after just one Click! overall a very easy to use app with an easy interface and very user friendly!

comments: I want to love this app, but it just keeps breaking down. I thought moving to a new S10 would solve it...and for a while it was fine. Now I have notifications from phone calls that won't clear, and it otherwise continues to cause more pain than pleasure. From the other reviews here, does not appear you fare any better with the paid version. It's a shame as conceptually it's the best app out there but execution is everything.

Originally I gave this app 5/5 stars but now it's 1/5. I paid for the premium version of the app but have recently been getting advertisement texts through the app. I've also noticed for a long time that my texts aren't being received or sent on time, anywhere from a few minutes to several hours. This has been getting progressively more common and I simply can't use this anymore. Both of these issues are extremely common complaints as in most of the reviews. It's unacceptable and I regret paying for this app.

In the hope of the app developer reading this, this is more of an error report than a review. I can't seem to contact you either through FB, Twitter or the app's "Assistance" so I'm trying here. Today I got a notification from the mood app saying "This call - Private number". I have no clue what it means and I can't remove it from my notification area, without disabling all notifications from the app. While trying to report it in the app I received another with a smiley. Why am I getting this?

I used to love this app. Have been using it since 2018. But Mood has recently gone downhill because of all the advertising. I was okay with the new ad banner at the top of the app, but I just found out they've been advertising their app at the end of all my recent text messages without telling me! I've been sending text messages to customers, and they've been getting these ads in my messages! Very embarrassing! App has been deleted and don't recommend it to anyone!

Updated my review. The previous issue of my texts not sending on delay has been resolved. Thank you I always loved this app. Had everything I wanted in a messaging app UNTIL the latest update. I agree with all the other recent reviews. I can't send texts unless I have a 0 second delay set. I'm going to find another messaging app to use, until you fix this issue. I will change my rating if this issue gets resolved

title: World Message
description:
World Message brings together your SMS and Instant Messages in one place. Create groups to chat with multiple people, send rich media messages, lease international phone numbers to SMS from, and much more!

Try World Message now and message family, friends and colleagues for free with our App-to-App Messaging feature. 


INTERNATIONAL SMS AND IM
World Message brings International SMS and Instant Messaging together in an easy and familiar format, giving you simple, low-cost text messaging to anyone around the world.

Be Local‚Ñ¢
Effortlessly rent a new local or international number in World Phone with Virtual and World IDs. It's a second phone in your phone! Use these numbers for business, travel or family in foreign countries. Available in 19 countries.

FREE APP-TO-APP MESSAGES
Enjoy free calls to any World Message user, no matter where they are in the world!

GROUP CHATS
Send SMS or INSTANT Messages to multiple contacts at once or create a group chat where everyone can take part. 

LOW-COST GLOBAL SMS
Enjoy competitive rates per SMS to any international destination.

DYNAMIC FAVORITES
Quickly access your most frequent and important message threads instantly from the Favorites menu.

EASY CONTACTS
Don‚Äôt wrestle with separate contact lists. World Message seamlessly integrates with your phone‚Äôs existing contact list.


// FOR BUSINESS
USE YOUR BUSINESS NUMBER(S)
Send and receive SMS from a company-provisioned phone number through our Enterprise platform, Corona¬Æ Cloud.

ARCHIVED COMMUNICATION
When used in corporate deployments, all inbound and outbound messages can be archived for regulatory compliant archiving. It‚Äôs FCA, FINRA, HIPAA, and LSB compatible.

SECURITY
All messages are encrypted to ensure your information is secure.

CONVENIENT AND COST-EFFECTIVE
Leveraging the Corona¬Æ network seamlessly transfers your current high-cost mobile services and phone numbers to a low-cost Internet-based solution. Enable your Telco strategy without end-user resistance.


--
Note
1. World Message does not manage your existing SMS messages. To include SMS, you can rent a number in over a dozen countries worldwide.
2. Messages sent between World Message users are not charged.
3. SMS messages sent from the App will be charged using World Credit purchased in-app.
4. To rent a number and send SMS messages, you must have a positive World Credit balance in your App.
5. World Credit and rented numbers can be shared between World Phone¬Æ and World Message.

title: YAATA - SMS/MMS messaging
description:
YAATA is influenced by the true spirit of Android. It is a SMS/MMS app that has so much to offer. You can personalize and configure this app to your definition of the perfect app. YAATA SMS is very powerful, reliable and the speed of the app is on another level. Even with all the exciting features this app has to offer the app size is under 3.9MB. This SMS app is highly user friendly and fulfils the wants and needs of the ultimate geek to a basic beginner user.

SMS/MMS
¬∑ Complete Multimedia Support including but not limited to sending and receiving: Pictures, Videos, Audio, VCards, GIFs.
¬∑ Delivery Reports for both sms and mms with the option to save delivery time.
¬∑ Group Chats
¬∑ Send Delay
¬∑ Converting sms to mms
¬∑ Archiving
¬∑ Scheduled Message Sending (Premium)
¬∑ Speakerphone mode (Premium)
¬∑ Night mode (Premium)
¬∑ Blacklisting (Premium)
¬∑ Auto forward (Premium)
¬∑ Auto responder (Premium)
¬∑ Copy and Paste select text
¬∑ A plethora of options when tapping message bubble.
¬∑ Backup and restore settings
¬∑ Tons more to explore and to be added!!
 

Quick Options
¬∑ 3 Different desktop widget styles
¬∑ Pin contacts to FAB tab
¬∑ Quick compose from notification shade (3 favorite contacts)
¬∑ Favorite contacts will appear when composing new message.
¬∑ Long press attachment icon to insert pictures quickly.
¬∑ And more! If you come up with faster ways don‚Äôt hesitate share! ;)


Notifications
¬∑ 3 quick reply styles
¬∑ Chat heads: Ability to view over lock screen! With a bunch of customizable and configurable options ( Some options for chat heads are premium)
¬∑ Pop up window: Again, the ability to view over lock screen with configurable options. (i.e. message limit, pop up size, close after sent and more)
¬∑ A simple Dialog window
¬∑ Custom Vibrations
¬∑ LED colors and ability to customize blink rate
¬∑ Repeat reminds for missed messages
¬∑ Changeable Swipe actions in notification shade
¬∑ Ability to set notifications for non-numeric address as well as unknown senders.
¬∑ Set up how you want to be notified when listening to music, in calls, when screen is on and more!!!


Customization for Individual Contacts
¬∑ Notifications
¬∑ Ringtones, custom vibrations, quick reply styles, LED color and blink rate, status bar icon and more.
¬∑ Look & Feel
¬∑ Bubble Color for sent and received, contact avatar and action bar color as well as text color and size can be changed for a specific conversation.
¬∑ Once again so much more for you to see for yourself!!


Look & Feel
¬∑ Themes!!
¬∑ Light, Dark, Black, Card based and Random Palette (you have the ability to create your own color palette in advanced settings and/or reset colors)
¬∑ Create your own themes with customizable contact pictures (size, shape, color‚Ä¶), fonts (sizes, colors bold options), message bubbles (colors, styles, animation), action bar color and the ability to change background colors and conversation list colors are just some ways to personalize YAATA.
¬∑ Others‚Ä¶
¬∑ Grouping threads by dates on conversation list (Today, Yesterday, Two Days ago‚Ä¶)
¬∑ Timestamp options
¬∑ Filter Option (search conversation by mms, send, received, dates, text and other ways.
¬∑ Alternating backgrounds to show different days
¬∑ Ability to enable or disable swipe actions in conversation list ( swipe to call, mute, archive, delete, reply create chat head)
¬∑ Ability to enable or disable the options to hide keyboard when scrolling, hide editor when scrolling, close keyboard after send, etc.

App Icon made by Corbin Crutchley
App description written by Jocelyn Prescott

title: Calculator Pro+ - Private Message & Call Screening
description:
Do you want to hide your private conversations? Worried about spam calls? Worried on your messages checked by others, then Calculator Pro+ is for you. It saves SMS/MMS/Call Logs of secret contacts behind calculator app.

To keep secret messages and calls of particular number, add it as Private Contact. After that when any new message received from that contact, it directly move inside application. Its easy to use and keeps user conversation secret. Your SMS and call conversation is 100% SECRET and secure.

It also provides free texting between users. Just Sign-In with your number. Send unlimited text, audio, photo and location details to another user.

Full of emoj characters (300 emoj support), useful to represent emotions.


Features:
- Password screen of calculator to open application
- Hide SMS and MMS 
- Filter/block spam calls
- Custom notification text & icon for private message
- Free text & multimedia messaging between users
- Auto backup
- Image/Audio/Location sharing
- Open from phone default dialer
- Hide app icon, cannot be seen or opened by other people
- Timeout: set a timer to close application
- Messages move back and forth from default messaging app

Note:
Android OS version 4.4 & above need to set AdvanceSMS as default SMS app for native messaging support.


Excited to receive feedbacks or queries at: info@privatesmsbox.com

title: Love Messages for Boyfriend - Share Flirty Texts
description:
Romantic Love Messages for Boyfriend is a great application to express your love to your special one. It contains cute love messages, SMS, quotes, and poems. As everyone knows it is difficult to express your love with words. No worries! 'Love Messages for Boyfriend' has a collection of really thoughtful, charming and creative messages to express your feelings in a perfect way! 

Show your love by sharing romantic love messages with your boyfriend by using this wonderful app. It contains the best collection of love messages, text, quotes, romantic pics and relationship messages. Save time and effort by using our heart touching messages. A beautiful and huge collection of most romantic images, cards and heart images for display pictures. Find creative ways to say I Love You to your beloved person.

Send a really cute romantic love quote or love saying that can be motivational & inspirational to him or update your Facebook or WhatsApp status with a beautiful love message. Finding the right words for him is a lot easier now.

Guys may not be that emotional but that shouldn‚Äôt stop you from sending love messages to your boyfriend every now and then. No matter how cool you think you both are for mushy talk, you can never be too cool to tell him how your heart beats for him. 

The trick in making the puppy love in your relationship last, is to find creative ways to say 'I Love You' by sending love messages to your boyfriend!
Download this app and get inspired to send love messages to your boyfriend!


Love You Messages for Boyfriend consists of :
‚ô• Love MessagesBeautiful and touching SMS messages to send to your boyfriend or express your love for your boyfriend on WhatsApp, Facebook and more.
‚ô•PoemsPerfect poems to share with your boyfriend especially when you're missing him.
‚ô•Cute messagesThe best and creative way to say 'I love you' to your boyfriend (and future husband)!
‚ô• Intimate Love lettersBe the best girlfriend in the world and make your relationship more beautiful with intimate love letters and poems
‚ô• Accessibility Easy to navigate

Download this app now and get access to our huge collection of love messages for free! By using this app, you can share all types of status with your fiancee, boyfriend, and husband via social media sites like Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

title: Signal Private Messenger
description:
Millions of people use Signal every day for free and instantaneous communication anywhere in the world. Send and receive high-fidelity messages, participate in HD voice/video calls, and explore a growing set of new features that help you stay connected. Signal‚Äôs advanced privacy-preserving technology is always enabled, so you can focus on sharing the moments that matter with the people who matter to you.

‚Ä¢ Say anything ‚Äì State-of-the-art end-to-end encryption (powered by the open source Signal Protocol‚Ñ¢) keeps your conversations secure. Privacy isn‚Äôt an optional mode ‚Äî it‚Äôs just the way that Signal works. Every message, every call, every time.

‚Ä¢ Go fast ‚Äì Messages are delivered quickly and reliably, even on slow networks. Signal is optimized to operate in the most constrained environment possible.

‚Ä¢ Feel free ‚Äì Signal is a completely independent 501c3 nonprofit. Development is supported by users like you. No advertisements. No trackers. No kidding.

‚Ä¢ Be yourself ‚Äì You can use your existing phone number and address book to securely communicate with your friends.

‚Ä¢ Speak up ‚Äì Whether they live across town or across the ocean, Signal‚Äôs enhanced audio and video quality will make your friends and family feel closer.

‚Ä¢ Whisper in the shadows ‚Äì Switch to the dark theme if you refuse to see the light.

‚Ä¢ Sound familiar ‚Äì Choose custom alerts for each contact, or disable noises completely. Simon & Garfunkel wrote a hit song about it in 1964, and you can experience the sound of silence whenever you want by choosing ‚ÄúNone‚Äù as your notification ringtone.

‚Ä¢ Picture this ‚Äì Use the built-in image editing features to sketch, crop, and flip your outgoing photos. There‚Äôs even a text tool so that you can add more words to the 1,000 that your picture is already worth.


For support, questions, or more information, please visit:
https://support.signal.org

Source code:
https://github.com/signalapp

Follow us on Twitter (@signalapp) and Instagram (@signal_app) for all of the latest updates and announcements.

developerAddress: 650 Castro Street, Suite 120-414, Mountain View, California 94041-2055
recentChanges:
‚òÖ Built-in support for video trimming turns any clip into a highlight. Most Android 8+ phones are able to make the cut.
‚òÖ You're great. Don't ever change...unless you want to use the image editor to update your Signal avatar.
‚òÖ When it comes to adding new emoji, we don't waffle (üßá) even a little bit (ü§è). Hundreds of new characters are available in Signal. If you can't see what's inside those parentheses, just look for the "Waffle" and "Pinching Hand" emoji after you update.
comments: The e2e encryption by default is great. The app can become your default SMS/MMS app: great! The voice quality on both voice-only and video calls is very clear, though a little, I don't know, tinny? There are no issues whatsoever understanding each other, it just doesn't sound natural. It seems that there's a little bit of degredation of image quality when sending pictures and videos and when on video calls. It'd be nice to have markdown support. Overall, I've got my family is on this, so...

It's been a very great app for me for several years, five stars to me, but after a certain recent update, it just freezes at random now, and sometimes I have to do a battery pull because it'll freeze my entire device during use as well. When Signal messes up but does not freeze my entire device, I check running apps and it's hogging a half a gig of RAM and hogging all 4 cores of my device's CPU, and I have to force-close it. And there have been other times it didn't receive messages (SMS and Signal) because I didn't realize the app was messing up at the time. Or I'll find my device is suddenly dead, and when I power it up and check what apps have recently used how much battery, it shows Signal was what drained it. It's like the app is getting caught in some sort of stupid infinite loop, and I wished I could explain what causes it to help you pinpoint it, but there's no rhyme or reason when it does act up. I mean, I work in I.T., I get it that things act up, and I learn to live with it, but on the other hand, I also NEED this to "just work." If this issue keeps up after the next couple of updates then I'll have to turn to something else.

Great App! I have been using Signal for about a couple of years now. I have had a few problems with it some messages not going through until later. But they have since have fixed that bug. Now, it's great. Flawless. I feel safe when using this app. I feel that my messages are going through with no problem. I feel that I can feel safe with nobody trying to hack my messages! So, give Signal a chance. You will be glad that you did!:)üëç

Great communicator, true end to end encryption. Call quality better then WhatsApp. It has some minor issues, but nothing what I would be worried about. I believe it will be fixed in future updates. The best I used so far. Group chat is not encrypted as far as I know, but neither other communicators offer that. I would be happy if there is no need to refresh signal's contact list when you add new contact to system's contact list. Didn't notice any other problems.

It looks OK and sends messages OK. A big BUT though.. Notifications randomly stop. This happened before so I stopped using it. It works fine for a few days after I install it, but then it's stops notifying of a new message. I have no clue someone has messaged me until, by sheer luck, I happen to open the app and up pops a notification! By my reckoning, this makes the app pretty useless.

title: SMS from PC / Tablet & Sync Text from Computer
description:
SMS Text Messaging done easier, faster, & better!

Send SMS & MMS text messages from your PC, Mac, or Tablet without touching your Android phone.

Named one of Time Magazine's "Best 50 Android Apps"

As seen on TechCrunch, Washington Post, Business Insider, Engadget, PC World, Lifehacker, VentureBeat, PC World, All Things Digital & more.

Save time; Increase productivity. Don't check your phone for every SMS notification! See who's texting you from your PC or Tablet without having to look at your phone's messaging app.

 
Great for online texting when busy working or in meetings. Manage your texts, picture messages (MMS) & see Caller ID of incoming phone calls without looking at your phone. Turn off incoming SMS notifications during presentations. Text meeting updates before leaving your desk. 


Perfect for real estate agents, sales people, freelancers, taxi dispatchers, event planners, and other businesses that rely on texting to send quick, professional bulk SMS messages to colleagues & clients. Text online from the comfort of your computer or tablet. 




Students love messaging & group texting (MMS) with friends discreetly Text online while in class "taking notes" on your laptop.



‚òÖ Text message from your PC, Mac, or Tablet sync‚Äôd with your Android phone number. Messages stay in sync with your phone's existing SMS messenger app.
‚òÖ Low Battery Alerts: See your phone's battery level on your desktop computer or tablet
‚òÖ Phone App Notifications on your laptop: Not just for your text message notifications! Get notifications from apps like Snapchat, WhatsApp & Uber - on your computer. Dismiss them from your PC or Mac as well
‚òÖ Schedule SMS Schedule Texts to send out in advance. (Schedule on your computer/tablet; text messages are sent from your phone)
‚òÖ SMS Backup & Restore: Backup your phone's text messages to MightyText and restore later to a new phone
‚òÖ Phone Call Alerts: See who's calling you on your computer/tablet. Missed calls & incoming calls stored to an online call log
‚òÖ Send Picture Messages from your PC: Integrate your desktop's photo library with your phone's messaging app via MMS
‚òÖ Contact Lists: Send bulk SMS messages to up to 25 contacts at once. Send as one group message or to individual contacts
‚òÖ Text free from Gmail on your PC: Send text messages directly from Gmail or Facebook on your computer (Chrome browser)
‚òÖ Our free online texting apps: WebApp, Desktop (Mac & Windows), Chrome Extension (for Notifications) & Gmail Chrome Extension. Coming soon: SMS from iPad
‚òÖ Block Numbers: Block text messages from unwanted numbers!
‚òÖ Text Message Templates: Sending the same content over and over? Set up SMS Templates to save time
‚òÖ SMS ‚Üî Email Sync: Send and reply to text messages from your email inbox
‚òÖ Priority Ringer: Ring your phone remotely, even if your notification sounds are off by letting your trusted friends/family text a special keyword.


By clicking "Install" you agree to these Terms of Service: https://mightytext.net/tos

Android & Chrome are trademarks of Google Inc.

developerAddress:
444 Castro Street, Suite 1200
Mountain View, CA 94041
comments: Been using Mighty Text for about three months now and am very happy with every aspect of it. Does exactly what you need it to do without the other party having it installed on their devices. Being able to make, reply or just monitor incoming phone texts while on the computer keyboard is much more convenient and faster for these old fingers than trying to do a long text on the phone keypad. Will be upgrading to Mighty Text Pro in the near future. Very well behaved program that does NOT interfere with the normal operation of other computer programs in anyway. Bob

There is no obvious way to stop the annoying reminder that covers the bottom right of the screen to say I have not checked in. I know that; tell me once, but then stop the constant reminders! No matter how many times I close the reminder, it comes back. There are programs that need that real estate, and the reminder is a problem. It also does not go away when you check into the program.

I have been using this app with windows and linux OS's for a number of years. I just upgraded my phone to a Galaxy S10 and it works well, actually better than with the S6. I like that it also works with my tablet. I recommend it for people who do not like tapping on screens, the amount of data for the free version is a bit limited, otherwise it's great.

I have been using the Mac version for several years and I am very pleased with it. For the last year or so I have also been using iPad (beta) version which I find even more useful ‚Äî as I always have my iPad with me. The great thing about this app (for me) is that I can read and send SMS from the app ‚Äî this even works when I leave my phone at home (so long as the phone is connected to the internet). My phone battery is old (like me) so having the ability to receive and send SMS when I am out of the house ‚Äî when the phone is at home charging is a boon for me.

I use this all the time. Allows me to text from my personal PC, work PC, note pad, and phone. And sync with them all. Also I can save my phone PICS to my PC or note pad directly without having to plug in a USB cord to my phone. Works Great.

title: Hangouts
description:
Use Hangouts to keep in touch. Message contacts, start free video or voice calls, and hop on a conversation with one person or a group. 

 ‚Ä¢ Include all your contacts with group chats for up to 150 people.
 ‚Ä¢ Say more with status messages, photos, videos, maps, emoji, stickers, and animated GIFs.
 ‚Ä¢ Turn any conversation into a free group video call with up to 10 contacts.
 ‚Ä¢ Call any phone number in the world (and all calls to other Hangouts users are free!).
 ‚Ä¢ Connect your Google Voice account for phone calling, SMS texting, and voicemail integration.
 ‚Ä¢ Keep in touch with contacts across Android, iOS, and the web, and sync chats across all your devices.
 ‚Ä¢ Message contacts anytime, even if they‚Äôre offline.
 
 Notes: Mobile carrier and ISP charges may apply. Calls to Hangouts users are free, but other calls might be charged. View our calling rates at https://www.google.com/hangouts/rates

‚Ä¢ Message contacts anytime, even if they‚Äôre offline.

Notes: Mobile carrier and ISP charges may apply. Calls to Hangouts users are free, but other calls might be charged. View our calling rates at https://www.google.com/hangouts/rates
summary: Hangouts - free messaging, video, and voice
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Android 8.0+ devices: Customized ring and chat message tones for individual classic Hangouts conversations and contacts will be removed. You can still customize general ring tones and messaging sounds for classic Hangouts by accessing Settings via the Menu section of the app.
comments: Going way off road these days, not just downhill. With every update, they remove another feature (custom notification sounds), then another (location), and another... Some features, like saving videos (a JFIF preview is what is saved, like the Web version), are broken and never fixed, while others (like sharing an audio clip) are half-removed because they want to force people to use another product (Drive) instead. Maybe just do that last bit, and use something (*anything*) else at this point.

They are slowly killing this app. It used to work well, but functionality has been dying and I'm guessing it's a bit on purpose given that they have been trying to make other kinds of messaging apps. First, custom ringtones went away, now, there is no notification ringtone at all, just vibrate. It's sad as the functionality with desktop Gmail and the Google voice numbers just used to be great. There's less and less reason to use this.

The app works fine and is a great way for me to contact and call my friends. The only problem is that I don't know how to change the ringtone. At first the notifications only came in as vibrations. Then I changed the notification sound back to normal, but the ringtone would be the notification sound looped. Could someone help me figure out how to change the ringtone back to normal? Thank you.

Just not the same. It wouldn't make the noise anymore when I got a text. I'd be missing texts, and texts not sending. Did an update on my phone which updated the app, and now the names of my contacts aren't associated with their phone numbers. I have group texts and i don't even know who's sending what text because it shows the number instead of the contact. Wish I didn't update it now. Would like to know who's sending me texts, not the number.

I love this app for it's multi functionality, great all in one messaging app. It is too bad Google is not investing enough in Hangouts. Instead they went for some weird multiple single task apps like that Allo bs app none one is using anyways. Duo is not bad for video calls, but again the problem is that every one you want to contact and chat with must have all these messaging apps installed on there phones. And why the hell did they remove location sharing?

comments: Too many steps from speech to text. Why are there so many unnecessary steps to simply talk and record? I?speak and a popup has many variations of what I just said, to choose from. Why? Why can't it just record what I just said? Really bad app! Show recog. was already disabled. It still has a mind of it's own. Now it wants me to change my default SMS mgr to this app. I'm sure many like this app, it's just not for me.

This app is not the best i've used. It keeps stopping while you talk and you have to keep pushing the talk button. I would've given a better rating. But not until the problem is fixed. Thank you but I'm going to uninstall for now.

It was a deal breaker for me that it has no MMS capability. I could not send or receive pics and I lost some MMS data that was sent to me, even after i switched apps. Disappointing issue on an otherwise nice app
So far it's fairly easy to use, (being a grandmom that I like!!) the mic stops after a sentence or so. And to continue you need to tap mic icon again, and again üòïüòï & again.

Trust me when I say this, this app is super awesome even all of these things that I written here right now are a product of the things that I voiced with the app and here it is wow I love this app. but then, i just found out that it can't work without data connection... that's not too good. Thanks

title: Fake Message Free 2020
description:
Have you ever thought of having to run from an uncomfortable situation while you are knowing a girl or a guy that you don't like?
With Fake Text Message Free 2020 you can simulate an escape message!

Or do you want to create entertainment?
You can create fake messages to simply play pranks.

"Fake Text Message Free 2020" allows you to fake entire conversations. The application has been designed to be as customizable and real as possible. Then you just have to send the screenshots to your friends!

What will be their reaction after seeing a whole conversation with a number familiar to them?
Find out now!

You can choose from the various types of fake messages you can send:

1) Fake SMS sent.
2) Fake SMS received.
3) MMS sent
4) MMS received

All this simply with:
- Create the message, choose whether to send it or receive it (If you want to insert the MMS just click on the icon
next to write message)
- Click on the top bar, on the name and choose whether to insert a number or name
- Change the timetable if necessary, just click on the timetable
- Click on the top right in the drop-down menu and select screenshot
- Click on the top right of the menu to choose a new color for your theme!

Now you can share it with your friends or girl!

We have created all this for a totally free fun ..

Have fun !

title: SMS Organizer
description:
SMS Organizer, a Microsoft Garage project, is the smartest of all SMS apps. It automatically organizes your inbox, sets reminders and keeps track of them, all this magic happens on your device safely, without any of your personal data being uploaded anywhere online. Never miss anything important‚Äîswitch to SMS Organizer as your default SMS app to experience it now! 
 
Why use SMS Organizer: 
 

Automatic reminders
Never miss your appointments! SMS Organizer gives you automatic reminders for upcoming trains, flights, buses, movies, hotel reservations, doctor appointments and even for bill payments. Also, create a custom reminder to help you remember anything you want.
 
Smart assist for tasks
Check Flight status, do web check-in, pay bill, book a cab‚Äîall of this and more‚Äîdirectly through reminders. SMS Organizer helps you complete important tasks by guiding you to the right web-page/app at the right time. 
 
Type with voice
Save time by composing SMS by speaking into the mic, with the help of our speech-to-text capabilities.
 
Forward bills to any contact 
Want someone else to pay? Share any bill with your contacts to automatically remind them to pay on time.
 
Save battery with ‚Äòdark theme‚Äô
Switch to the beautiful new dark theme‚Äîto see better in sunlight or whenever you feel like. 
 
Auto-backup keeps you safe
Back up your messages to Google Drive. If you lose your phone, switch to a new one or even format it, your messages will be safe. Restore your messages when you reinstall SMS Organizer.
 
Personalize as you like
Star an SMS for quick access or block spam senders. Also, customize notifications, ringtones and font size. Reply to messages directly from the notification drawer, without going to the app.
 
View unread messages easily
Quickly filter down to see only your unread messages, without being disturbed by the ones you‚Äôve already read.
 
It works offline
All the amazing features work perfectly without any internet. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
We would love to hear from you
If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, feel free to email us at smsappfeedback@microsoft.com

SMS Organizer is a Microsoft Garage project. The Microsoft Garage turns fresh ideas into real projects. Learn more about The Garage at: http://microsoft.com/garage

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Bug with notifications. I have been using the app for more than a year now. Really love the way it works and organise everything. But when you make this app as you default app for messages it doesn't show any notification specially OTPs. Been struggling with it for past few days. Changed and modified notification settings for both app as well as system but couldn't find any solution. Set stock android messaging app as default again,problem solved!!!

Used to be the best app but recent update has given birth to some bugs like I used to reply to the message from the app's notifications earlier but now after replying a message notification switches to "Sent" notification and to send next message I have to open an app. And When I do it, it didn't open until I dismiss the "Sent" notification. Using Nokia 6.1 Plus Android 10

Please make search optimisation in a easy manner when we send texts. For example: if I want to search for contact naga sudhan uncle. After typing naga uncle i can't search for the contact because I didn't type sudhan in between. We have facility in samsung default application and apart from this this application is fantastic and keep it up guyzzzz

The app is too good to be true. I can't describe how useful it is. Sorting into promotions, transactions, personal messages saves the day. However, I do have a minor battery concern. You seem to run a service called ForegroundAppTrackerService which seems to keep the phone awake for a while. It takes a few percentage flat off my battery. Android message app doesn't do this. Can you look please into this? Thanks a ton for this great app! Update: Reducing rating due to no fix and no response

I would be a fan of this app if the stability and reliability issues are attended to. It's a great app with organising features but lacks the reliability. I liked the themes, tabs, organization overall. But after using it for couple of months, got frustrated that I am not getting messages and even important messages from banks. I am afraid to use it again. Thank you for the instructions. It works fine now.

title: Dual Sim SMS Messenger 2019
description:
Are you looking for a beautiful, super-fast and highly customizable alternative to your stock Android messaging app?
Well, today is your lucky day. Dual Sim SMS Messenger 2019 is simply outstanding!

This brand new 2019 messaging app is simple, intuitive, personalizing and fun!

‚ù• Dual Sim SMS Messenger 2019 makes it easy to communicate with anyone by using SMS, MMS, and more. Stay in touch with friends and family, send group texts, and share your favorite pictures, videos, audio messages. 

‚ù• Dual Sim SMS Messenger 2019 comes with beautiful themes, lovely emojis, blacklist feature, pop-up windows, and much more. We are committed to making SMS Plus faster, safer and user-friendly. Messaging has never been so fun and efficient!

‚ù•The Block option is your true savior from unwanted & spam SMS and MMS. You don't need to install any additional SMS Blocker app too keep those pestering messages from ruining your mood. It automatically blocks spam messages. so you can enjoy a spam-free Inbox

‚ù• All of Dual Sim SMS Messenger 2019 features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to become a VIP Member to remove ads forever. Also, you get access to gorgeous VIP exclusive themes!

‚ù• Dual Sim SMS Messenger 2019 is pretty special; try it, tell your friends, shout from the treetops, but most of all enjoy it!

‚ù• Our app is supported by devices running Android‚Ñ¢ 4.4, Kit Kat, and above.

‚úèÔ∏è If you have any suggestions or if you need help, don't hesitate to contact us!

‚úèÔ∏è Send us a message at smsplus@junkyapps.com and we'll get back to you as fast as possible.

‚úåÔ∏è This App is compatible with different brands of phones like Samsung, Huawei, Sony and HTC.


‚ò∫Ô∏è Check us out here:
http://www.getsmsplus.com/
https://www.facebook.com/smsplusapp/
