title: Handcent Next SMS (Best texting with MMS,stickers)
description:
Handcent Next SMS 8.0 has arrived, bringing to you all kinds of new features, visual and stability improvements.
The best replacement android text messaging app for your stock SMS text messenger app. 
- Best SMS app with ultimate customization 
- Tons of handy features to make your life easier
- Group text to send messages to multiple recipient 
- Cloud back-up, never worry about long texts ever again
- Texting from computer 

- Reliable guard to keep texts safe and secure
- Wear OS support, receive and reply texts from your android wear device

Starting in 2010, Handcent is not only the pioneer but also the ultimate message customizer in all SMS messaging app: giving user great free texting experience is our top priority. 


Ultimate Customization
Gorgeous themes and backgrounds, everything can be changed to your liking in our texting app. It‚Äôs the most popular message customizer, you can personalize text messages (free mms), bubble style, fonts, color, ringtone, LED color, vibration pattern, etc.  Theme store now offers more wallpaper and bubbles for you to choose from. With new 8.0, we also more free-style font personalization with support for more areas, all new night mode, and pop-up window and etc.  


Handcent Anywhere
Best texting companion on computer and tablet. 
With Handcent Anywhere you will be able to send text messages from your PC, Mac, or Tablet without touching your Android phone texting app. It can come in handy in office or home settings where you can simply focus on the computer screen without worrying about missing a text.
Go to aw.handcent.com and start chatting.

MMS plus 
Share full-size multimedia(pics, audio, video) messages with your friends.  MMS plus can act as a multimedia android text messaging downloader, save the multimedia files on our cloud server. (It‚Äôll open in the browser if not installed). With 8.0 version, you will also be able to compress video.

Pop up
Quick reply messages with pop up window, it can even show over lock screen.
Handcent Next SMS text messenger app now has new look and functionality, try it to explore more. 

Private Box
Your own personal space, a totally encrypted message box that can only be opened by a unique passcode set by you. Best way to protect your privacy.

SMS Backup
Never worry about losing your texts with our newest backup service. Easily restore all your messages (SMS / MMS), settings and scheduled task when you switch to a new phone or factory reset your phone.

Wear OS support
Support for receiving and replying messages on all your android-based smartwatch, along with the features like quick replyÔºåvoice reply(voice to text) and so on

Search
You can now search within the conversation. You can also search text messages by time, message type and etc. 


SMS Blocker/Blacklisting
Block all unwanted or spam SMS messages in our android text messaging app.

Scheduled Task
Schedule texts to be sent at a given time. It's useful when you need to remind others or yourself at a particular time. 

Emoji
Have more fun with your friends in the best customizable texting app. Now even with the fun emojis and animated ones. 
Plus the latest 1600+ emojis including all sorts of diversities and skin tone, also complies with the newest emoji standard in a sms messenger!

Stickers
Now integrated with Giphy. You can now send the popular, trending or whatever stickers you can think of by doing a quick search. Handcent is the best sms messenger with stickers.

Sticky on top
Handcent Next SMS sms  messenger pins your favorite contacts on top based on your need.


Globalization
Support for multiple languages to send sms messages. 

Underneath there‚Äôs a ton of improvements to improve the speed, stability and battery usage. 

Other features include: Group Messaging Chat, Bulk SMS, text snippets and etc.

For those of you who are willing to help us translate the app, please contact us at help@handcent.com

comments: Excellent. Been using this app for years now. Had a problem with Avast flagging it as a virus. Contacted customer service. They were very helpful. They contacted me back straight away. They have spoken to Avast. And the problem was sorted out in no time. No problems at all now. Excellent customer service. Would definitely recommend this app.

I have been using it for 6 months becuase I hated the native app in my Samsung Galaxy S8 plus and I needed something more powerful with more options. I tried a dozen other apps and this one is perfect for everything I needed, too many things to mention, give it a try, you won't be disappointed. Great SMS texting app [HHw1hZv6]

Love this app! I've used it for years. I love the how easy it is to customize. However I just spent the last hour trying to figure out why my notification sound wasn't making a sound. I was trying everything until I clicked on something & it took me to the google play store, I saw an update was available. I read the items that were updated & saw the 1st one was fixing the no notification problem. I did the update & bingo all is working now. My favorite feature is the delay in sending a text!

Great feature-set and absolutely top notch support! After upgrading to Android 10, I had all kinds of issues with every text messaging app I was trying out. Handcent was quick to respond and to resolve the problem. Between personalized notifications, customizable themes and the private box, this has everything I need, plus the peace of mind of reliable support.

I've been using this app for many years across many phones. I thought maybe it would be my new phone's battery (Galaxy S10). However it turns out this app is eating up almost 8% of my battery just being idle, according to my battery usage graph. That's just Insane. My phone battery is about just as bad as my previous phone after 4 years of use. I truly enjoy using this app but this battery usage issue Seriously Needs to be resolved. Please fix this. I would very much like to rate this 5 stars.

title: SMS from Tablet & MMS Text Messaging Sync
description:
SMS Text Messaging done easier, faster, & better!

Text from your Tablet, using your current Android phone number.


Named one of Time Magazine's "Best 50 Android Apps"


Save time; Increase productivity. Don't check your phone for every notification! See who's texting you from your tablet without having to look at your phone's messaging app over and over. 



Great for online texting when busy working or in meetings. Manage your texts, picture messages & see Caller ID of incoming calls without looking at your phone. Turn off incoming notifications during presentations. Text meeting updates before leaving your desk.


Good for real estate agents, taxi dispatchers, and other businesses to send quick, professional messages to colleagues & clients



Students love messaging & group texting with friends discreetly. Text online while in class "taking notes" on your laptop. Many college students have called it "iMessage for Android". 




‚òÖ Turn your tablet into an SMS Messenger
‚òÖ Messages stay synced w/ your phone's messaging app
‚òÖ Instant Notifications on your tablet when text messages arrive on your phone
‚òÖ Schedule SMS Schedule Texts to send out in advance from your tablet
‚òÖ Low Battery Alerts: See your phone's battery level on your tablet. Get alerts when phone is low on battery.
‚òÖ Group Texting:  You can also send MMS group texts (reply-all type) from your tablet (only if your Android phone supports Group texting)
‚òÖ Phone Call Alerts: See who's calling your phone - on tablet. Missed calls & incoming calls stored to an online call log
‚òÖ Sync your phone's photos & videos to your tablet Dead simple sharing of photos and videos taken on your phone. Easily save sync'd media to your tablet. (optional feature)
‚òÖ Contact Lists: Send bulk messages to up to 25 contacts at once. Send as one group message or to individual contacts
‚òÖ Send Picture Messages (MMS Picture Messaging) from tablet. 
‚òÖ Quick set up - under 30 seconds
‚òÖ 100% Free (no additional charge from what your Carrier charges - text free)
‚òÖ Online Texting from PC too: In addition to your tablet, use MightyText on your Computer to SMS from PC or Mac. Text online from any internet-connected device!

Note: you must also have an Android phone & install the MightyText app ON YOUR ANDROID PHONE FIRST, before using the tablet app.  If you don't have that yet, please download and set up MightyText on your PHONE, from Google Play: 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.texty.sms




Additional Features:

Quick Reply SMS Popup Option:  On an incoming message, see a message popup on top of your current tablet app activity, and reply directly from the popup window to quickly get back to what you were doing.  This is turned off by default, but can be enabled in settings.

Save Battery Life:  MightyText saves battery on your Android phone, because your Your phone's screen is off. is the ultimate battery saver. Also, see a Live battery indicator & battery widget - showing your phone's battery status on the tablet.

Phone Call Logs:  Call Logs also stored to show history of missed calls as well as incoming & outgoing calls (Call logs turned off by default)

Phone Dialer on Tablet:  Live dialer so you can dial your phone's contacts from your tablet (the dialer tells your phone to initiate the call)

comments: I have been using the Paid version for a couple of years using an Samsung phone. Overall it works very well and is an important app for my desktop. I have it running in the Chrome browser and use it for texting all day. Sometimes it is slow to capture new contacts, so I refresh periodically during the week. Occasionally, some phones (mostly older iphones) have problems receiving the text. My wish list is the ability to change fonts & sizes, and control paragraph formatting with better WYSIWYG.

So far when I install on Samsung S10+, app seems to think phone is a tablet and says "Make sure this is the same account you used to set up your phone". I am not given any instructions for setting up phone. I think I don't have the correct app but can find no app that says it is for my phone. Tablet is a Galaxy Tab A (10.5) and has exactly the same message! App is so far of no use to me.

Can't finish app setup!ü•∫ Hello, I'm experiencing the exact same problem as Karen Boyster on this review page. I also have a galaxy S10+ phone and galaxy tab a but 9.7. I tried to send an email to the address you told her to contact but that email for support is coming up as invalid and won't send. I'm really dissapointed and need tech support

I've been enjoying Mighty Text for over a year now. Took a little work to get everything paired but it's great to have an app that pairs on three devices. Best part is the ability to compose and send texts on my laptop- and it let's me know when a call is coming in also. A real convenience that I use every day.

Seems to work well but no way to create or add to a contact or even copy the contact number from the app? That should be a basic feature. I can use Universal Copy to copy the number from the screen then go and create the contact but this is a silly workaround!

comments: It's not fun to have to pick your number after it expires and get a completely new one I have went to the help center and it told me that there was a "new number button" but there wasn't one there so basically I had to keep on reinstalling this app and then uninstall it I gave it two because it does work it's just really annoying

This app has been such a blessing for me. It allows me to stay in touch with my family and friends by texting and calling free using WiFi and this incredible free app. Due to job loss from company shutdown no longer able to afford cell phone plans for family causing great hardships but the devs of this app, guardian angel and lifeless useless phones with no service plans on hand and cheap wifi for low-income families my family and I can start to get back on feet again plus shed stress also.

The calls always drop and the app constantly crashes. In order to reach someone I have to try and call back now up to 3 times in a row! I can't even send emojis to people because they appear as a scramble of random script to them. Not being able to just pick up when someone calls is SO inconvenient. Also it sounds like the conversations are being tapped. You can hear rattling or your own voice echo back through your speaker. The loud ads at the end of calls are annoying. Zero stars if I could.

Zero stars.I used this app for for everyday calling and texting for almost 2 years until the other day when it automatically logged me out and then said my phone# has expired. I lost all of my text history and all of the #s I had conversations with that weren't saved in my contacts because I never thought I would randomly just lose access to my own conversations over night. I have customers that owe me money that have no way of collecting from now and they can't contact me now either. Not happy

Brilliant app! Quick to sign up and set up everything how I want it etc! Far cheaper than buying credit, I've had a reliable service so far on calls and texts. Would recommend this app to everyone that loves keeping in touch with people and who want to do it for as cheaply as possible, or even for free if you don't mind watching a few videos and adverts.

title: Auto Message - automatic send and reply sms sender
description:
‚úî AUTO MESSAGE SENDER - AUTO SMS SENDER
‚úî AUTO ANSWER CALL - AUTOMATED EMAIL SENDING

‚óè Introduction:
‚úî Auto Message is an scheduling app. You automate the do your task ( send automatically, reply automatically, auto answer call ... ) by scheduling the executing task at a future user-specified time.

‚úî Auto Message The easiest way to automate your daily tasks on your Android smartphone or tablet. Via the simple interface Auto Message offers a simple solution to make automated tasks on your device in just a few taps.

‚úî Auto Message helps you by automating the activities you did manually before, and customize them in a way that works for you. 

‚úî Auto Message save your time and help you do some task when you busy or sleeping. 

‚úî With Auto Message, you can keep your task on cloud and share your task to other people.


‚óè Features:

‚úî AUTO SEND SMS - TEXT MESSAGE task (automated text message): The SMS is completely driven by the user .You compose the text of the SMS, and you set the time. So when the SMS sending is triggered later, it is completely with your prior consent.

‚úî AUTO REPLY SMS task: SMS Auto Reply - automatic reply with text / SMS message to incoming texts when you are busy, away, in a meeting...

‚úî AUTO REPLY PHONE CALL task: When you missed/rejected a call, with AUTO ANSWER CALL feature, an automated text message will be replied to sender immediately.

‚úî AUTO SEND EMAIL task: You can schedule your sending email with this app and they will be sent automatically to one more multiple receiver.

‚úî Switch on/off WiFi and Volume automatically.

‚úî Group Alarm Task. You can make Alarm with complex triggered conditions. You can share to your family, your teammate, ...

comments: Needs improvement integrating with contacts list. My contacts in my area don't have the +1 before their number. I can text and call them fine but the app needs the +1 to work so I have to manually enter in the ph# each time. Also, the app lied to me saying my sms was sent when nothing was delivered due to the +1 problem.

It is a good app. However, there is a crucial feature missing. That is a date setting not only hours) for a task end. For instance: If I am on vacation it should allow me to set the task for a date of my return. If you make the feature I'll be happy to give 5 stars.

who give you the idea of always connected ??? it was your ??? horrible experience because I have to be always connected and drain my battery because......? why ? nothing is working without internet. even I bought the app, I have a lot of ads till I connect again. BTW, wifi ON and wifi OFF IS NOT WORKING ( android 10, sony Xperia). all settings are available only if I am connected. VERY ANNOYING most probably I'll drop the app and uninstall it... I don't need my money back, be yours.

Good app. I bought the paid version. I need to send a few SMS each day at the same time. I tried it today but it only sent it when I opened the app. More than 20 minutes too late. Did I miss something? Overall I like the abundance of features, including twin sim capabilities. Good work guys!
Added 1 sms schedule then immediately u will be asked to upgrade your account. No use at all. Immediately uninstalled on my mobile
